This app uses the front or back camera to detect tiny changes in brightness due to the blood flow under your skin. Instructions: - Avoid flickering lights (i.e. fluorescent tubes) and changing backgrounds, as they can interfere with the reading. - Point your camera to an uncovered part of skin, face, hands etc. - Keep a steady image. - The grey numbers show the instant rate between beats, use it only as indication of having localized a good spot - Press start to begin recording, the numbers will turn black and the app will begin accumulating heart beats. - The reading averages with time, after 30 heartbeats a tiny heart will appear, that shows a stable enough reading. - Pressing stop the reading will halt and the last value will be shown. - Press erase to begin again. The first times you use this app, it is a little difficult to get a reliable reading, try it various times to get used to it, try also different skin spots to point. It works better under natural light sources, if your light source causes interference or you can't keep a steady image, you can also use this app placing your fingertip over the camera, covering it, and it will detect its change in transparency, no flash needed. This is a beta release and only tested on my LG device. Please tell me what do you think about it. Uses internet permission to show adMob ads.

Ever wanted to swap two faces in a photo? Well Multi-Face-Swap allows you to swap as many faces as are in photo! What more, with just the shake of the device! Yes, now you can actually swap faces in android device with just a shake. Just shake the device any number of times and see a new result every time till you get a perfect swap you wanted. You don’t need to be a master of photography to achieve the effect. Just use Multi-Face-Swap and leave the rest to it. Ever felt pain and cumbersome in adjusting masks over those little faces? What this app offers you is totally hassle free user experience. Now you don’t have to use masks and resize them over small faces, just click the pic or pick one from gallery with as many person as can be and shake the device to see the magic! Use this app to • Swap your face in a college/school group shot. • Switch faces in your family portrait to create ever lasting memories. • Try some cool swaps on celebrities. • Swap yourself with your girlfriend, colleagues, friends, family members. **FEATURES** -> Very user friendly, use without any hassle. -> Face detection on its own, no need to create masks. -> Multi face swap capability. -> Shake to swap. -> Generate multiple swaps by shaking device any number of times. -> Pinch Zoom. -> Image Rotation. -> Save to Gallery. -> Works on all size of images. -> Support most android devices.

Make a dash for Candy Kingdom! Candy boom is a funny puzzle match 3 game. ✰ ★ ✰ ★ ✰ ★ ✰ Pop candies like bubbles. ✔ Use match 3 combinations to make candy crush. ✔ Special combinations (4 in line, 5 in line, T and L shaped combinations) create super candies. ✔ Combine super candies to see super crashes! ✰ ★ ✰ ★ ✰ ★ ✰ If all the jelly slots are crushed in certain number of moves, you get a bonus game with multiplication of candy scores. Level up. Hone your skills as a diamond and challenge your friends in duels. ★★★★★ Try your luck in slot machines. Invite your friends, spin the wheel of fortune and win prizes. Get high score and lead in different candy tops! Have fun!

Design and bead your own one-drop or two-drop peyote beading projects with this enhanced app designed for tablets (not phones). Choose from 132 colors to add to your working color palette. Save patterns to 20 pattern files. Let the app guide you through constructing your own peyote beading project. Much easier than trying to bead from paper patterns, and much more flexible. App includes four simple sample patterns. You can start from one of the samples, change the design and colors, and save as one of your patterns. You can change all beads of one color in a pattern to another color, such as changing all Red beads to Pink. Designs are for both odd and even peyote patterns. You can change the shape of the bead to four different shapes: rounded rectangle, circle, oval, or rectangle. You can pick the size of the bead--small (1440 beads), medium (1000 beads), or large (640 beads). Help tips are provided by touching the ? icon. The app provides messages about features, what's new, and what's in the works. Supports the sharing of beading patterns through "export" and "import" features. You can export a pattern file and email it to another iBeadPeyoteEx beader. You can save patterns outside the app and rename the pattern. So you can save many, many beading patterns. Use as a fun drawing app even if you are not a beader. Designed for use on tablets. Works well with an inexpensive stylus pen.
release_text: The app works on a broader variety of tablets and improves the layout.

description: The real, violent, dangerous tornado in your smartphone! Panda Soft - The best live wallpapers and launchers for your smartphone! Installation instructions: Home -> Menu -> Wallpapers -> Live Wallpapers Scroll down the list, find out the wallpaper and setup it. Note: It is live wallpaper so you can't open the app, you will need to follow the instruction above in order to set the wallpaper. Also slower/older devices (shipped with Android OS below 2.1) can't run it too.

Easy and one click tool to enable swap and boost the ram. Memory RAM is a important piece in the operating system. Android manage well the memory RAM but sometimes it kill some task/process when detects a slow ram scenario, other times turns the device slow and inoperative. Adding a swap file will increase the RAM of your device and you will feel it more smooth in some scenarios. Also cleaning tasks in background can do more fast your device and to have a fast response in the graphical interface. <--Features--> · Memory booster : - Clean all memory in background. - Enable swap file . - Enable swap in partition . <--Requeriments--> Some operation needs root permissions like to enable memory swap. Bugs are welcome to the mail of developer.

Welcome to the most magical village resort: Fantasy Resort! A fashion adventure in bloom! Build up your amazing resort in a whole new way! Earn new flower coins & move up levels for hours of additional fun! Enjoy fashion fun, experience the spa & makeup salon and explore the exciting recording studio! Experience your own fairytale adventure in Fantasy Resort! Earn flower coins to unlock new items. You can earn more coins as you move up in the different levels! The possibilities for fun are endless! Spa & Makeup Salon With Fairies! The four season fairies go to the spa! Relax with different colored steamers & natural eye masks in the spa beauty parlor! At their makeup beauty salon use fun makeup like mascara, eye shadow, eyeliner, and blush! Magical Design & Dress Up Houses! Design their clothes in their Fashion Design house! Head to their dress up house on their map and assemble new clothes from an amazing selection of wings, dresses, horns & so more to make the perfect fairy outfit! Hidden Objects/Find The Object Mini Game! Look closely! Find the object you need from dozens on the page! Keep track of the items you find with the special counter on the page! Blossom Boutique! Complete your fairy’s fashion with an amazing selection of clothing and makeup from the village’s boutique! Earn flower coins and buy your fairy tons of cute clothing! Studio Adventures & Card Designer! Create your own fairy tale in the studio when you record your own voice! Show off your style in 4 different fairy themed scenes! Make the fairy memories last forever with the card designer, too! Features: > Tap the map to visit different houses in the Fantasy Resort! > Earn flower coins in each scene! > Master and advance to new levels! > Select a character from four beautiful fairies! > Treat the fairy with different colored steamers, face masks, & natural eye covers > Swipe through an amazing selection of makeup, like blush, mascara, lipsticks & more! > Drag to design your own amazing fairy clothes with paint, stickers, & buttons to add on! > Click to dress up the girls in enchanting outfits of your choosing! > Take a picture in the card designer game, with backgrounds, frames and stickers > Model your design in different flowery scenes in the studio & show your family and friends! What's inside: > 7 different houses & activities: dress up, fashion design, spa salon, makeup salon, card designer, studio, hidden objects & boutique! > 4 beautiful fairies! > 25 outfits, 11 dress up categories, 7 makeup categories! > Dozens of accessories like necklaces, scarves, hats, and bracelets! > 9 different cleaning tools for the ultimate spa party! description: View your state standards in one convenient FREE app! A great reference for teachers, parents, and students to easily read and understand the standards. Quickly find and search standards by subject, grade level, and key word.

You are a convict that just broke out of jail! Can you survive the escape? Race your robber through the forest, collecting as many gold coins as you can to unlock bunches of upgrades that include longer duration of bonuses, extra lives and even survival mode. But beware of the rolling boulders, piles of rocks, tree branches and other obstacles as you out run the guards from the prison. Swipe up on your device to jump. Swipe down to slide under things. And side to side to avoid the obstacles. - Run, Jump and Dodge obstacles! - Collect gold coins and upgrade your convict. - Track your stats and beat your high score. - Unlock Hard Mode for the ultimate challenge. - Great endless fun for kids of all ages! - Download for FREE now!
Help Sinterklaas to find the presents. Drop piet by pinching a balloon so he can catch all the presents. But watch out to not jump into the presents. Per prepared for the 5 december dutch feast.

** iPray for Mac OS X is OUT! RAMADAN PROMOTION - FREE for a LIMITED time ** ******************************************** ** NEWS ** ** Full version of iQuran will now be sold for a fraction of its original price, down to $1.99 from $6.99. InshAllah ** the new price will reflect only the costs we need to cover for the fast and excellent audio download service ** we provide. BarakAllahufikum and Ramadan Kareem. ******************************************** Read the Holy Quran in Arabic alongside its translation. This app provides you with the full Qur'an as well as its full english translation along with a full set of audio recitation files. iQuran offers you verse by verse audio playback, color coded Tajweed (pronunciation) rules, repeat functions, bookmarks, tags, search, excellent navigational controls, a side by side english translation, audio recitation and much more. NOTE: Permission to "read phone state" is only required in order to pause recitation in case the phone rings or in case you place a call while recitation is playing in the background. Apart from offering an immersed user experience, the free version of iQuran includes the following limitations only: * Full Landscape supported * Color coded Tajweed (Pronunciation) rules for the last Juz / Para * Bookmark and Tags. A maximum of 5 bookmarks and 3 Tags. * One english translation: Shakir * Search results limited to 20 per search * One recitation: Sheikh Husary * Powerful audio controls with an option to group playback of verses to aid in memorization All other features are fully enabled and there is no expiration date on this app. iQuran has been designed to work on all Android devices.
release_text: Fixed a rendering issue where some words were being clipped on some devices in portrait mode

description: A good vocabulary boosts your personality through articulate language. Vocab PRO is a perfect tool to enhance your vocabulary, make you stand out from the crowd and build up an impressive image. One of best features of Vocab PRO that makes it different from the rest is its feature of unlimited sentence completion exercises; it helps you learn in a fun way, may it be just as a game with your friends or something to keep you busy in a constructive way when you’re bored. Vocab PRO is specifically designed for students appearing for GRE, SAT, GMAT, CAT, ASVAB, TOEFL, IELTS, TOEIC, MCAT, PCAT, NMAT, SNAP, CMAT, XAT or other competitive exams; for those who are looking to build a substantially rich and diverse vocabulary or for simply those who wish to broaden their linguistic horizon. The various categories of words in ‘Study Words’, ‘Random Words’ or ‘Sentence Completion’, are all interlinked in such a way that no matter whichever option you choose, it will help you learn the word in the correct way - pronunciation, meaning, grammar and example in sentence usage. Vocab PRO not only helps you learn new words but also guides you towards using the newly-learned words in its proper form and context and acts as a handy dictionary as well. With a comprehensive database of several diverse words, it features the correct audio pronunciation of the word, synonyms, antonyms, grammar and its correct use in a sentence all in one selection of the word. This app makes it a pleasurable and fruitful experience to learn new words at any time on the go. Furthermore, Vocab PRO allows you an option to categorise your learned words into ‘known’, ‘unknown’ and ‘not sure’ depending on the level of your preparation and to attach additional notes for future reference. By this you can go back and refer to the words that you are ‘not sure’ or ‘unknown’ and learn them to your best. Vocab PRO can be used in a variety of ways from just learning new words, their correct audio pronunciations to revising and testing your vocabulary makes it a ‘complete’ package of learning. With its clean, uncluttered and intuitive interface and rich features, Vocab PRO is the complete solution for all candidates appearing for competitive exams as well as for those who simply wish to upgrade their vocabulary. Vocab PRO is the perfect tool to enhance your vocabulary, master the usage, grammar, synonyms, antonyms and pronunciation of tricky words and constantly evaluate yourself through unlimited sentence completion tests.
release_text: Vocab PRO v3.0.0 -Study Words (flashcards) -Random Words -Sentence Completion -Search Words -Categorize Words -Audio pronunciation -Make personal notes for each word -Result for Sentence Completion Vocab PRO v3.0.1 -Added help if audio not working -Minor bug fixes in Random Words -Minor bug fixes in Sentence Completion

description: Pure news widget is a scrollable widget for news reading (Rss/Atom) compatible with Feedly and your own RSS list (OPML) . Note : since Google service ends (July 1rst), Pure news widget will sync with Feedly service. WARNING: This is a scrollable widget which REQUIRE Android 3.x/4.x device or ADW Launcher, Launcher Pro, LiveHome, Go Launcher Ex. If you don't use a Launcher supporting scrollable widgets, it won't work. Features: - Use phone credentials to login to Google Reader. No password (for Android > 2.0). - Connected to Google reader to retrieve your prefered news, or get your feeds from your own RSS feed list in text format (OPML) - Scrollable widget with most alternative launchers like ADW, LiveHome, Go Launcher, LauncherPro or Android 3.x/4.x - Click on a news title to open the full story in the browser or in internal viewer (works in offline mode too !) - Show news thumbnails - Multiples skins (including fully transparent) and widgets sizes to make a fancy widget - Lot of options to customize rendering - Can use Google Mobilizer to reduce used bandwidth when reading full article - Support Google Reader mark as read - Optional local cache of articles - Can restrict sync to Wifi connection - Support multi-widget with as many feeds as you want - Support Android up to 4.4 (ICS / KitKAt ...) A problem ? Please, mail me for support. If you have issues with disappearing widgets on Samsung devices, please read this: http://goo.gl/woDKcx
release_text: 1.4.8: - REVERT TO PREVIOUS ANDROID SDK ... too many widget size issues 1.4.7: - FIX Feedly feed listing 1.4.6: - FIX widget size issue with Android 4.x 1.4.5: - FIX refresh issue with daily viewer - FIX info panel crash - IMPROVE soft option menu display - FIX very big text size

description: Знаменитая игра "Шляпа" теперь и на Android. Вам больше не нужно готовить клочки бумаги и придумывать слова, все автоматизировано для Вашего удобства. Вместо шляпы, бумаги и секундомера используйте Ваш смартфон. Играйте с друзьями, идеально подходит для посиделок в кафе или для вечеринки. Игра Шляпа разряжает обстановку и помогает растопить лед между старыми друзьями и новыми знакомыми. Правила игры очень просты, игрокам не требуется обладать какими-либо супер способностями. В игре могут участвовать более двух пар игроков. Игрок пытается объяснить слова, которые он "достает" из шляпы, своему напарнику, за определенный промежуток времени. Запрещено использовать прямой перевод, однокоренные слова и указывать на предметы. Побеждает пара, угадавшая наибольшее количество слов. Ключевые особенности приложения: - тонкая настройка игры: количество пар, слов, время на угадывание, звук уведомления - пять уровней сложности игры (сложность слов), от простейшего для новичков до сложнейшего для более опытных игроков - игровая статистика - деление игроков на случайные пары - звуковое оповещение о том, что время для объяснения вышло The famous game "Hat" is now on Android. No longer do you need to cook the scraps of paper and come up with the words, everything is automated for your convenience. Instead of hats, paper and stopwatch use your phone. Play with your friends, ideal for gatherings in cafes or for a party. Game Hat discharges environment and helps to break the ice between old friends and new acquaintances. Game rules are very simple, players do not need to have any super powers. The game can participate more than two pairs of players. The player tries to explain the words that he "gets" out of his hat, his partner for a certain period of time. It is forbidden to use the direct translation, cognates and point to objects. The winning couple, guess the greatest number of words. Key features of the application: - Fine-tuning the game: the number of pairs of words, the time for guessing, notification sound - Five levels of game difficulty (complexity of words), from the simplest to the most complicated for beginners to more experienced players - Game statistics - The division of players into random pairs - Audible warning that the time to explain the left

Исправлено действие "Сбросить настройки по умолчанию". 1.6.42 - Исправлена ошибка со случайным закрытием диалогового окна "успели/не успели" 1.6.41 - Исправлена ошибка с размером текста. Изменены ресурсы.

app_name: アンチエイジング+ダイエットforポケットメディカ
description: ◆◆◆【重要なお知らせ】月額課金方法変更のお知らせ◆◆◆ ポケットメディカアプリのご利用ありがとうございます。 この度、有料機能が開放される月額課金方法がdocomoSPモード決済からGoogle Playのアプリ内課金へ変更になりました。 基本無料である点は今までとかわりございません。 ◆「アンチエイジング＋ダイエット」について◆ 本アプリは、体の若さを保ちならがら健康的なダイエットをサポートするアプリです。 毎日のダイエット記録をつけていくことで、独自の判定方法によって算出される「体年齢」が表示されます。「体年齢」を意識し、基礎代謝を高めるための運動を行いながらダイエットすることで健康的な身体作りができます。 ◆「体年齢」を若くするためのポイント◆ 単に体重のみを落とし、体脂肪率に変化がないと「体年齢」が上がってしまう場合もあります。 「体年齢」を若くするためには「基礎代謝」を高めることです。「基礎代謝」を高めるためには、継続して軽い運動を行い筋肉量を維持・増進するように心がけましょう。「基礎代謝」高めつつ、体脂肪率を落して行くことで理想の体に近づき、「体年齢」も若くなっていきます。 ◆利用上の注意◆ 「体年齢」は統計データをもとに、弊社が独自の判定方法によって算出しています。本アプリにおいて表示される「体年齢」はあくまで健康の「目安」として認識し、ご活用ください。 「体年齢」は測定時間や水分の補給時間によって変化しやすい数値になります。「体年齢」が実年齢を上回った等で過度に数値を意識し、急に激しい運動に取り組むことは体を壊しかねませんので、くれぐれもご注意ください。 本アプリの利用およびダイエットの実施は、いずれも自己責任で行うものとします。本アプリを利用したダイエットにおいてトラブルが発生した場合でも、株式会社C2ではその賠償の責任を一切負わないものとします。 過度なダイエットは控えていただいた上で、ダイエット中に体の異変を感じたときは、直ちに医師にご相談ください。 ◆月額課金方法◆ 月額課金をしていただきますと、便利機能が開放されます。 課金方法はGoogle Playから『ポケットメディカアプリ』をダウンロードしていただき、アプリ内課金で『月額課金』を購入していただきます。 『ポケットメディカアプリ』で『月額課金』を購入していただきますと『家庭の医学forポケットメディカ』『処方薬事典forポケットメディカ』『アンチエイジング＋ダイエットforポケットメディカ』の便利機能が同時に開放されます。 サービスの詳細は、アプリ版ポケットメディカのwebページ（ http://pocketmedica.jp/pocket_all_app.html ）をご覧ください。 ◇◆アプリの権限について◆◇ 「ネットワーク通信」 起動画面で他のおすすめアプリを紹介するために利用しています。
release_text: ver3.2 ・体年齢の計算ロジックを修正しました。

description: The zoo animals are hungry. Explore the zoo from zone A to zone Z. Feed them by matching 3 food in a row or column. Keep feeding them until the animals are full and before your moves or clock run out. Game features: - 200+ levels - Obstacles and specials to make the game more challenging - More items and upgrades available in the market - Facebook share to get bonus coins Play for FREE Keyword: zoo, match, food, jewel

Chiediamo a chiunque dia una votazione a quest'app di spiegarci il motivo della sua scelta o tramite recensione o per mail privata! Solo così potremo migliorare facendo tesoro dei vostri suggerimenti. Versione 3.1 - Non c'è più vinoh. - Ma c'è ytp sound 3.0! - Ah ma è ronco! - Allora va.. e riempilo! YTP Sound è tornata con una veste grafica nuova e nuove funzionalità tra cui un mini quiz, in cui dovrai dimostrare le tue conoscenze! Fissato bug della condivisione su Whatsapp e altri bug minori. Versione 2.1.1 fissati alcuni bug nella condivisione Versione 2.1 -Invio delle voci tramite WhatsApp! -Aggiunta delle voci richieste dagli utenti (69 voci e 3 nuovi tab). -Aggiunti nuovi collegamenti a nuovi canali di pooper emergenti con classifica per numero di iscritti. -Aggiunta del tasto WAT -Miglioramento della grafica e del layout. -Aggiunta la possibilità di contribuire e supportare l'applicazione. Versione 2.0 -DIMINUITE LE DIMENSIONI DELLE VOCI! -aumentato il volume delle voci più deboli! -possibilità di spostare su scheda SD CARD per preventivare lo spazio di archiviazione -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria del cellulare -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria delle notifiche -la possibilità di inserire una voce come suoneria della sveglia -la possibilità di condividere la voce sui socialnetwork -link ai canali youtube dei migliori poopers italiani -nuovi personaggi (ruoppolo, pino cammino, mario, capobastone, etc.) -nuove voci per i personaggi già presenti -tasto "Random" per una voce casuale -tasto "Svuota" per resettare i preferiti -tasto "WAT" simula funzionamento dell'App -migliorata la veste grafica. YTPSound è la raccolta delle frasi celebri dei personaggi più famosi di Youtube: in parole povere è il vademecum essenziale dello Youtube poopers alle prime armi.. e non solo! Vuoi iniziare un tuo amico alle Youtube poop? Fagli sentire il prof Testoh che risponde alle critiche di Nappa, oppure fagli sentire la voce del maestro Osvaldo Paniccia che dialoga con Giuseppe Simone.. Divertiti a far parlare tra di loro Andrea Diprè, Richard Benson, Matteo Montesi, ecc.. description: Enhanced version of Network Places Lite. If you have the demand for Android connecting to a computer, for example, viewing photos or watching movies, you will find that it is suitable for this App! SMB (Samba/CIFS) client for Android devices. It allows connecting to shared folders hosted on Windows or Samba servers over Wifi. It allows managing several connections with authentication. It comes with both a device file browser and a SMB file browser. It provides download support for files and folders. You can rename, delete, and view media files. Browse and transfer intents are available for third party applications. Root access is not needed. The advanced video player is also embedded to help to play video in your phone and it is totally free！ The video player supports all the most popular video formats without any conversion. Its smart core technology auto detects video formats, subtitles and makes it much easier for you to enjoy smoother, better quality videos. But it might block some features if AD can't successfully load. Some Custom ROM will redirect ad links, please check your / etc / hosts file to prevent blocking ads. Features: Connect to Windows share folder. Upload and download files through samba protocol. Shortcuts and Bookmarks management. Enhanced Image Viewer. Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Remote Desktop(RDP) Advantages Online media playing via Samba Online document reading via Samba Full features Media player(Innocomm Player Plugin) free to download. Enhanced Image viewer. MX Player Compatible TV Mode We're looking for translators in many more languages. The implementation is in progress,any suggestion is welcome! http://www.facebook.com/NetworkPlacesLiteInnocomm http://www.mobile01.com/topicdetail.php?f=423&t=3504302&p=1#45603161 How to Add a Shared Folder in Windows 7 http://www.wikihow.com/Add-a-Shared-Folder-in-Windows-7 Author: Mori Lin. description: This all new version of Conversion Calculator is the answer to all your conversion and convert questions. This app allows you to convert all your favorite units in the following categories: - Angles - Area - Cooking - Digital memory - Force - Fuel consumption - Length - Mass - Radiation - Power - Pressure - Speed - Temperature - Time - Volume Remember, if you have any request regarding a missing unit in this application, please respond to the email address below. This app is Add supported. An 'Add-Free version' is being developed.

Remember, please contact me in case of unexpected behaviour or requests. Thank you for using Conversion Calculator.

description: An accurate and useful compass in your pocket! Accurate Compass has a great 3D view along with an intuitive user interface. This tool works exactly like a normal compass and is easy to use for: -checking (magnetic) North, South, East, and West, -navigating unfamiliar places, -finding out the bearing of objects in the distance, -or just checking which way your garden faces! The compass also shows the bearing (in degrees) in a side window and its 3D view will work even when your device is not held parallel to the ground. This app is the same as Accurate Compass, but without the adverts! Note that this app relies on the magnetometer of your mobile device so accuracy may vary. Also, please check that your device isn’t being affected by a magnetic field. There is advice on calibrating your device within the app.
release_text: Version 1.4.1 - minor updates to graphics - About page added Version 1.4.0 - Korean translation - updated warnings and sensor status screen

app_name: After you leave me Atom theme
description: This theme is provided with one piece of free wallpaper. Please try to press the multi wallpaper button in the theme settings to use more images! (In-app product can not be refunded after purchase.) [How to use the multi wallpaper] Theme settings - Multi wallpaper - Click ‘Buy All’ - Buy * When You purchase the paid version, can use the multi wallpaper theme. ▶Atom Theme User Guide 1. Press and hold an empty space on the home screen to choose your theme, or press the menu for theme settings 2. Choose and apply the desired theme 3. Changing icons: able to change every icon (press and hold each icon to change individually). 4. Changing point color: able to change point colors on the top of home and app screens ▶Tips 1. Incorporating photos in the gallery with Atom icons (Menu – Wallpapers - Apply) 2. Changing colors and/or hiding home screen texts to match the theme (Launcher Settings – Home Screen – Icon Text Color) ▶Atom Store With weekly updated themes, icon packages, and widgets that range from sophisticated, simple themes to artists’ sensuous illustrations, you can decorate your phone’s home screen daily: search Atom Store on the search tab!! ▶Theme Maker A simple theme creating function that allows you to build your very own themes with the photos in your gallery 1. Press menu on your home screen, or enter through Theme Maker on the upper-right-hand corner of Theme Settings 2. Choose any wallpaper (multi-wallpaper, still photo, etc.) 3. Choose icons and point color and… 4. your very own personal theme! - You may not edit the theme once it is finished, but you can delete it in Theme Settings and simply create another! ▶Notes - Available in Android 4.0.2 or higher - You need at least 20MB in main storage to save theme related resources - The installed application’s icon will not be visible on the menu to improve usability - Soon to be available for tablet devices ex.) Galaxy Tab (X-large screen) - Badges for missed call and unread messages are only available in standard application: functionality may differ from one manufacturer to another - Optimus View series only supports a select few themes due to resolution (4:3) issues - Certain manufacturers’ default widgets may not show in Atom Launcher as they are made to use only from their default home screens ▶Customer Service Please leave reviews (5 stars are like Red Bull to exhausted developers) If you find any suggestions or inconveniences in using the application, please contact us through email addresses posted below: - Customer Service mail: cs@dlto.co.kr - Blog: http://blog.naver.com/atomlauncher - Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Atom.Home

You’ll be bouncing off the walls in this sweet candy platformer! Help guide our sweet bouncing cupcake from candy cane to candy cane, avoiding the spiky sugar bugs, and gathering as much candy as you can to attain a high score! Use boosts to enhance your gameplay and push your score even higher!

Raise, feed, breed, play with, and sell thousands of different kinds of koi. Decorate your pond and make it beautiful! Splash the interactive water and play with your new koi family, then visit your friends' ponds to see what they've named their koi! Then go fishing at the Mystery Pond to catch new koi for your ponds! Features: ✶ Thousands of koi breeds to collect ✶ Totally interactive koi will bite your finger and swim around in response to your touch! ✶ Visit your friends' ponds! ✶ Send and receive koi! ✶ Beautiful, serene ponds with relaxing ambience ✶ Decorate your ponds any way you'd like ✶ Interactive pond creatures including ◇ Frogs ◇ Turtles ◇ Hummingbirds ◇ Dragonflies ◇ Crabs ✶ Name your koi, creatures, and ponds! ✶ Go fishing at the Mystery Pond with a rod and bobber! ✶ Totally free to play with NO advertisements! ✶ No Internet connection required to play!
release_text: - New Feature: Free online backup with any purchase of koins or credits! - New Feature: Send and Receive koi from your friends!

Night Filter is an easy to use screen filter application for your Android phone or tablet. Night Filter makes it easy for you to dim your screen, adjust your color tint, and more! Use it to read at night with less eye strain and correct for an excessive screen tint. This is the ad-free version; get this if you like the free version and would like to remove ads and support the developer. :) Features ★ Adjust your screen's brightness and color. ★ Add quick shortcuts to your home screen. ★ Schedule the filter to start & stop at a specific time. And more! Download the app and try it out to see all of the features. Troubleshooting * If you accidentally turn your screen black, press volume up or volume down inside the app to turn off the filter, or power off your phone by holding the power button. * If "Override screen brightness" doesn't work, try turning off "auto brightness" from your settings. This feature may also cause your screen to turn off and/or the lockscreen to activate if the setting is too low. * To install an app from any app store, please turn off the filter first. If you have any questions or concerns, please don't hesitate to contact us by email. Permissions Draw over other apps: Required for the screen filter to work. Google Play license check: Check license.
release_text: - On Android 4.4 KitKat devices, can now dim the area behind the soft keys on the home screen when using colors. Check "Filter navigation bar" to turn it on.

description: First Off The Tube (Lite) helps you board the Tube in order to be closest to your exits and interchanges at the chosen station. It incorporates a detailed database of each and every exit and interchange found on the Tube system and works perfectly well while you're underground as it needs no internet connection or GPS information. You can search by line, or just by the station name to find the station you're looking for. The app also provides information on the closest stations to a number of London's tourist attractions. The LITE version covers the ten busiest stations only, and a limited number of tourist attractions. *** People, for those of you that mark the app down because 'there is no functionality in it': The app is supposed to show you that the full version can do certain things, and this is what it would look like, etc, so you'd not be buying a 'pig in a poke'. It helps you to judge if you like the design, looks, font size, etc. Also to actually help you on the most frequented stations! Thanks.
release_text: Updated to latest station layouts (incl. S7 trains on Circle, H&C and District lines where applicable).

description: This new app is great for getting around Barcelona using the Metro, Tram and Cable Car services. It contains a beautiful map, some unique features and is ideal for visitors and locals. ● KEY FEATURES ● ● Colourful clear map with major geographical features and places of interest. ● View the map, look up places of interest, plan your journey, etc all without an internet connection. ● Unique "Minute Map" feature provides a view of travel times to any location on the map. ● Route text itinerary with step by step instructions. ● Easily locate your nearest transport stop. ● Online street map integration (internet connection required). ● OVERVIEW ● The Barcelona Metro - Map and route planner by Zuti makes it easy to travel in and around Barcelona using the Metro, Trams and Cable Car services. The application contains a professionally drawn map and route planner with many unique features. The map provides a simple and colourful view of the city transport services with the ability to switch to an online street map view when an internet connection is available. ● MINUTE MAP ● The unique minute map feature provides a view of travel times using transport from any location on the map. This is helpful for getting a sense of scale and connectivity of the transport system and can provide some interesting results. ● ROUTING ● The application does not require an internet connection and will always be available to display a clear and detailed view of the city transport systems, plus list and animate the optimum route for your journey. Provides the fastest route calculations of any mobile routing application (virtually instantaneous) using actual published journey times with the ability to select the quickest route or the route with the least changes. Comprehensive details of your planned route are provided, including “direction”, “towards” and “service frequency” information (not available on any other offline journey planner) for example “Take the L5 TMC Cornelià Centre-Vall d'Hebron metro towards Cornelià Centre for 4 mins (2 stops). Service runs every 5 minutes” which is essential when finding the correct platform and direction. Also given are alternatives for each leg of the journey. ● NO INTERNET CONNECTION REQUIRED ● The map and routing do not require an internet connection and you will not be charged data connection fees. This means the application saves on battery power and runs perfectly underground, on an aeroplane, etc. For international visitors to a city who have data roaming turned off this is an ideal solution. ● MORE MAPS ● This map is one in a series of Zuti worldwide city maps, if you like this product you may also enjoy some of our other offerings, please visit www.zuti.co.uk for further information.

Get drawn into an action-packed world when you join the heroic doodle, Sketch, in a battle to save your notebook from an army of sinister scribbles and evil doodles! Scribble Hero charges real money for additional in-app content. You may lock out the ability to purchase in-app content by adjusting your device’s settings. • Face off against diabolical bosses like the fire-breathing Dracopede and the alien overlord Triblorb on your way to uncovering the ultimate boss of Scribble Hero! • Stock your arsenal with awesome weaponry like the Doodle Destroyer and the Red Marker of Death! • Voyage through outrageous worlds from medieval castles to outer space in a quest to save Sketch's girl pal Dot, the cutest doodle in the pad! Scribble Hero features unique hand-drawn graphics, 50 levels of pure, adrenaline-pumping fun, and a ton of boosts, weapons and upgrades to collect and customize your experience every time you play. Get ready for doodle-blasting mayhem! FEATURES: • Simple one-touch controls • 50 levels filled with nonstop shooting action and thousands of enemies • 10 evil boss monsters • Collect coins to unlock boosts, tombstones, weapon upgrades and extra lives. • Unique rewind mode lets you fight back and cause more havoc if you die too soon! • Use special weapons to punch holes in the paper and literally scrub out enemies with a permanent marker! • Survival Mode – See how long you can survive against endless waves of enemies! Scribble Hero collects personal user data as well as non-personal user data (including aggregated data). User data collection is in accordance with applicable law, such as COPPA. User data may be used, for example, to respond to user requests; enable users to take advantage of certain features and services; personalize content and advertising; and manage and improve Nickelodeon's services. For more information regarding Nickelodeon’s use of personal user data, please visit the Nickelodeon Group Privacy Policy below. Our Privacy Policy is in addition to any terms, conditions or policies agreed to between you and Google, Inc., and Nickelodeon and its affiliated entities are not responsible for Google's collection or use of your personal user data and information. Use of this app is subject to the Nickelodeon End User License Agreement. For users residing in the EU, Scribble Hero may include the use of persistent identifiers for game management purposes and installation of this app constitutes your permission to such usage of persistent identifiers for all users on your device. Privacy Policy http://www.nick.com/about/privacy-policy.html End User License Agreement http://www.nick.com/info/eula.html Customer Support http://appsupport.nick.com

ATTENTION: This app is created for development use. You shouldn't download it if you are not making a theme since it doesn't add any functionality to your system. Theme Debugger allows you to test the graphics created for your theme chooser (tmobile) theme on a simple and rich application. You can choose between the standard Android UI themes (Holo Dark, Holo Light, Holo Light with dark actionbar) and see how they work with the Tmobile Theme / Modded graphics that you are developing. All the main Android UI graphics are there: from buttons, radios and checkboxes, to spinners, alert dialogs, toasts and notifications. HOW TO USE: It's simple, apply your Theme Chooser Theme, open Theme Debugger and test the resources you have created using the tabs. If you need to change the Android theme, open the navigation drawer by swiping from the left side of the screen. *Android is a trademark of Google Inc.

description: Aeroplane Parking is a 3D aeroplane simulator game in “Arcade” category on Google play. Enjoy the new game of simulator parking from Timuz. Your mission is to park all the airplanes as soon as they arrive on the runway. Park each airplane on the marked parking area. Play exciting levels that will challenge your parking skills. Avoid speed parking, drive carefully and do not crash your aero plane. If you like parking mania games and crazy parking or simulator games, then you will like this game. Avoid the bus, car and trucks on the runway of the airport. GAME FEATURES:- - 100% free game-to-play - Different airplane to drive and park - NEW Realistic physics - Real 3D environments, with multiple camera views - Google Play Game Services integrated for leader boards and achievements. - UNLOCK new achievements to challenge your friends on leader board. - Share on Facebook and Google Plus. So what are you waiting for? Start the Parking Mania now! How to Play:- Tap your phone/tablet on right side to drive / brake. Tap on left to control steering. description: Olena Shypilova presents the free course “Finnish in 7 Lessons” for RUSSIAN speakers, an application that will help you bring your Finnish skills to a level of comfortable communication on basic topics! Application developed by http://speakasap.com . Tailored to beginners, this course is simple, logical, structured and short. The course includes only Basic Finnish grammar, the type of grammar used most by people all over the world for everyday communication in Finnish. Every lesson is offered in audio format: we provide understandable explanations that make it easy for you to listen to our course anytime on the go. All the exercises address a specific topic with useful and common vocabulary. All answers are provided in audio format. In contrast to typical exercises where you simply click on the correct translation of a word or the correct verb form, leading to boredom and the inability to think on your own, we composed our exercises in a different way. In our exercises you translate the whole sentence at once. You can always check your answers. You will find 80% of all words used in the exercises either in the lesson materials or in previous exercises, so it’s not necessary to consult a dictionary all the time. Moreover, memorizing new words comes with practice, especially when you construct phrases or sentences without assistance. Features: • Full version of the free course “Finnish in 7 Lessons” • Interactive exercises for assessing your knowledge and teaching the material • Audio materials with the explanations of the lessons and exercises • Video materials with the explanations of the lessons (requires an internet connection) • Easily access speakASAP online • Quickly get in touch with the Support service • All materials (except video materials) are stored on your electronic device and available without an internet connection Join our groups: http://vk.com/speakASAP http://www.facebook.com/speakASAP http://twitter.com/speakASAP http://blog.speakasap.com Join our YouTube Channel: http://www.youtube.com/user/eustudy We will be happy to receive any comments and propositions from you. Write us at mobile@speakasap.com Install! Test it! Let us know about bugs! Study with pleasure! For additional information refer to our site http://speakasap.com/ru/finnish-in-7-lessons The course’s founder Olena Shypilova and the speakASAP team.

description: Linux man pages v1.1 provides offline, complete reference of standard man pages of Linux in easy to read format. Application does not require additional download of reference files from internet. Just install and start reading! It contains references on General commands, System calls, Library functions, Special files, File formats and conventions, Games, Miscellanea and System commands and daemons. Standard man pages at kernel.org are included in this version; more will be covered in upcoming releases. Interface is kept simple and elegant, similar to standard Linux console look. Application is designed for speed and performance. All the contents are packed in just 2.5MB! Hyperlinks within pages make cross reference easier. Topics can be found via categories or using Search of commands. ManPages 1.1 currently has 1000+ pages, will be covering much more in upcoming releases. This is completely free.

description: As you slowly regain consciousness your eyes begin to focus on your surroundings. You find yourself alone in an unfamiliar room with no memory of how you came to be there. Moonlight streams through a small barred window illuminating the musty stale air. How long have you been here? Worn stone steps lead up to a wooden door, you grip the cold metal handle and turn but it’s locked from the other side - are you a prisoner? Can you escape? Prepare to explore a mysterious manor house and the fog shrouded moors which encompass it. Solve puzzles and search for clues to discover the manor’s secrets and ultimately escape from Darkmoor. This is a point and click adventure designed exclusively for mobile platforms.
release_text: THE SECRET REMAINS HIDDEN - A set of clues exist within Darkmoor Manor which ultimately lead to a real world treasure hunt! - Follow a trail of diary entries that will help illuminate the Manor's murky past. - Need a helping hand? Use the integrated hint system to assist you on your adventure. Changes: Minor bug fixes. Warning: This update will reset your game progress.

description: Mr.Papi (red ball guy) is so hungry in a mysterious labyrinth. Touch the arrow buttons at the screen bottom to move and eat delicious hamburgers! If a bomb is ready, tap the bomb button to blast the walls around him. His life automatically decreases. But it restores when he eats a hamburger. If the life run out, the game is over. - If your device doesn't support multiple touches, release other buttons when you tap the bomb button. - You can also control by D-Pad keys if your device has.

description: This app is intended FOR PHYSICIANS with a working knowledge of likelihood ratios and only available in ENGLISH. Otherwise, please do not download the app as it will not fit your needs. This popular app which is used by over 130,000 physicians worldwide has just launched a premium version, which is updated with latest evidence from series such as the Journal of the American Medical Assocation's Rational Clinical Examination Series. **** 'The top 10 quick reference medical apps for iPhone released in 2013' - iMedicalApps ***** Diagnose is a novel medical app which aids clinicians in the diagnosis of common internal medicine conditions. The app allows users to incorporate validated findings from the history, physical examination and investigations to calculate an evidence-based likelihood of disease. This app is intended for use by internal medicine physicians and trainees, with the goal of improving patient care and medical education at the bedside. Diagnose provides you with an evidence-based pre-test probability, validated likelihood ratios and a calculated post-test probability based on your findings for over 45 of the most commonly seen conditions in internal medicine. The data is validated from sources (JAMA Rational Clinical Exam Series, etc). When examining a patient with a presumptive diagnosis, such as stroke, physicians can now see in real-time how specific findings on the history, physical exam and laboratory evaluation of patients alters the likelihood of disease. "Diagnose is a fantastic app that encourages the application of evidence-based medicine in clinical practice." - Daniel Schwartz, MD The following evidence-based summaries are included in this app: Acute Cholecystitis Acute Otitis Media, Child Alcohol Problems Ascites Bacteremia Cancer, Family History Cardiac Arrhythmia, Any Cardiac Arrhythmia, Significant Central Venous Pressure CHF Cirrhosis Compliance and Medication Adherence COPD COPD (Multivariate) Death after Cardiac Arrest Deep Vein Thrombosis Delirium Dyspepsia Ectopic Pregnancy Headache, Need for Neuroimaging Hemorrhagic Stroke Hypovolemia, Adult Hypovolemia, Child Influenza, >60 years old Influenza, any age Irritable Bowel Syndrome Knee Injury, ACL Knee Injury, Meninscal Tear Meningitis, Adult Myocardial Infarction Osteomyelitis, Diabetic Paracentesis Peripheral Arterial Disease Pleural Effusion Pneuomnia, Adult, Community-Acquired Pneumonia, Infant and Child Pneumonia, Ventilator-Associated Renal Artery Stenosis Septic Arthritis Sinusitis Splenomegaly Streptococcal Pharyngitis Temporal Arteritis Thoracic Aortic Dissection Upper GI Bleed, Locating Upper GI Bleed, Severity Urinary Incontinence, Women Urinary Tract Infection, Women
release_text: NEW HIGH YIELD CONDITIONS: Blunt Intra-Abdominal Trauma Carpal Tunnel Syndrome Dementia and Delirium Lumbar Spinal Stenosis Malaria, Endemic Areas Malaria, Returned Travellers Malnutrition, Predicting Surgical Complications Retinal Tear

description: It is application for measuring angle with various method. Main Function 1. Various measuring method : Gravity Sensor, Camera, Touch, Magnetic Sensor etc. 2. Calibration : Calibration function makes easy and accurate measure when measuring angle with sensor. Instruction 1. Plumb Mode 1) Set device in parallel to the baseline of the measuring object. 2) If you need, turn on the Camera by touching Camera button on the upper-right corner of the screen. 3) Read tilted Angle on the upper-left side of the screen. 2. Frame Mode 1) Set device in parallel to the baseline of the measuring object. 2) If you need, turn on the Camera by touching Camera button on the upper-right corner of the screen. 3) Read tilted Angle on the upper-left side of the screen. 3. Inclination Mode 1) Contact your device on the slope. 4. Touch Mode 1) Set device in parallel to the baseline of the measuring object. 2) If you need, turn on the Camera by touching Camera button on the upper-right corner of the screen. 3) Touch measured point and check the value of angle on screen. 5. Plane Angle Mode 1) Set device in parallel to the baseline of the measuring object. 2) Calibrate measuring value. 3) Rotate device to measure angle and check the value of angle on screen. Reference - Some device is difficult to measure when battery is low state. Especially, Plane Angle Mode because of Magnetic sensor. - Can be a tolerance caused by sensor accuracy of device.

Galaxy Explorer presents a 3D model of nearly 15,000 stars in nearby space. The database contains detailed information about these bodies, and offers a search function to filter the data, including any of the star's names or id's, and its stellar classification. In addition to the supplied stars, the app allows you to import more data from external sources, with built in support for the format used by two of of the most popular collections, HYG and XHIP. If this isn't enough, you can also create your own data file, including any fields you'd like to see, and import it into Galaxy Explorer using the generic importer. Although the built in database of 15,000 stars should run on any device, if you choose to download a large dataset containing around 100,000 or more stars, then you'll need a good graphics chip and at least 1MB of RAM.

Stickman run is a fun running game where you must guide stickman through a series of challenging worlds/levels but that is easier said than done. Each world is designed to give you endless stickman running fun and keep you entertained always. Use your skills and instincts to overcome every obstacle in each world by running and jumping over them until you reach the great black hole. Come and join stickman on his quest for running success and be the greatest runner among your friends and global players in each world. *****Scores are sent to Google Play leaderboard****** ******check out the video above for world 1 walkthrough**** -----FEATURES----- .FREE updates .Simple controls press to jump .Compare scores with friends and global players .2D running platformer with smooth animation and game play ------------------------------------------------- Download Stickman Run now

Magic Academy is a hidden object game with a mysterious mix of puzzles and adventure! A sorcery detective story, magical items and mystery are woven together to produce an enjoyable mix of charmed seek & find crime adventure and a hidden object story! Mysterious events have shocked the world of magic! A young student wizard named Annie has disappeared from the fortress of the Higher Academy of Arwindale. Her little sister Irene decided to enroll at the Magic Academy and promised herself to find her sister no matter what. At first glance, it appeared that the friendly wizards of the castle had something hidden. But eventually she realized that only real lords of sorcery could uncover the mystery held by fortress of this higher school of magic. Features: - Mysterious and magical storyline - Exciting hidden object tasks from the masters at the Academy’s castle - Spell lessons and recipes of ancient charmed potions - Characters of sorcery will show you the secrets of magic - Charmed fortress locations bring you to the world of wizards and warlocks Magical puzzles, mystery hidden object tasks, sorcery and the mysticism of the Magic Academy wizards are waiting for you! Act quickly! Magic does not tolerate confusion! This hidden object adventure puzzle is recommended to all fans of Harry Potter, sorcery, witches, magical items and predictions, spells and seek and find games!

ScootPad is a leading adaptive learning platform for grades K-8. ScootPad uses adaptive algorithms, predictive analytics, data visualization and gamification to deliver personalized learning for each student. Features include: - Common Core Curriculum in Math and ELA for all K-8 grades - Adaptive and fully-automated practices & assignments - Differentiated learning with individualized Learning Paths - Step-by-step instruction to easily explain each concept to students - Formative Assessments with 50+ technology-enhanced formats - RTI aligned intervention tools to predict students needing intervention - 100s of GRL aligned eBooks to enhance student reading level - Behavior tracking to reinforce positive behavior - Deeper student engagement using “game-like” features - 24/7. Any device. Anywhere. Cloud Based. Secure. "The results I have seen are very encouraging. My students are constantly engaged, up to date on all homework, and most importantly, working at their own individual level." - Mr. Wilcox, Teacher from Lemoore, CA. “My daughter has consistently done well in school using this as a resource guide for the past three years.” - Tammie, Parent from Portsmouth, New Hampshire. “We are very pleased with our experience using ScootPad. Our students scored very well. The test was taken in the fall and the spring. One classroom alone showed a 180 point gain. When we researched which classrooms showed the most gain and success on the test, we found out that those teachers used ScootPad math as part of their daily blended instruction time. Our results with ScootPad have been so incredible that our principals are now requiring all students to complete one ScootPad Math and one ScootPad Reading lesson each day starting in the fall.” - Cheryl Hill, District Curriculum Director, Fort Gibson Public Schools, Oklahoma.
release_text: Thanks for using ScootPad. We're continuously making improvements and fixes to our app so it continues to work great for you. In this version, we've improved the overall performance, fixed the orientation to landscape, replaced the app icon, improved user interface and more.

description: Encrypt File Free can encrypt and protect photos, videos, audios, pictures, doc, ppt, xls, pdf and other files using a password. This app can encrypt and lock all file types such as private photos and videos, confidential office documents (Word, Excel, PowerPoint, etc) and any other files for they can not be opened or viewed by others. The encrypted file can only be opened with the correct password. This application has two modes of encryption: Automatic: Use master password to encrypt / decrypt the files. Manual: You must enter a password to encrypt / decrypt each file. There are two folders: Encrypted: It stores the decrypted files. Decrypted: It stores the encrypted files. Keep in mind: - The encrypted files are saved in the same folder as the source file after encryption, except when the files are encrypted in the 'Decrypted' folder. - The encrypted files in the 'Decrypted' folder are saved directly in the 'Encrypted' folder. - The decrypted files in the 'Encrypted' folder are saved directly in the 'Decrypted' folder. - You can change the settings of the application from the 'Options' menu. Encrypt your files and not just hide them. This solution is better and safer than simply hiding files. The available languages are English, French and Spanish.

★★★Named by Google a "Best App of 2014" ★★★ CNN connects you to the world -- wherever you are. The redesigned CNN App for Android has been rebuilt and redesigned for use on both your phone and tablet. Stay informed with the latest headlines and original stories from around the globe. Follow up-to-the-minute reporting with breaking news alerts and live video. Share stories and videos and comment on top stories. •Get breaking news alerts and follow stories as they develop. •Go beyond the surface with international, politics, opinion, tech and entertainment stories and more. •Watch video clips and coverage of live events as they unfold. View your favorite CNN shows live (as available, check with your cable, satellite or telecommunications provider). •Contribute a story or opinion to CNN iReport by uploading photos and video directly from your app. Follow other iReporters and see stories from their points of view. •Access your local weather information, including current and extended forecasts. •Browse photo galleries related to today’s news. •Sync your Samsung Galaxy Gear to your CNN app and receive breaking news and top stories on your wearable device (available on select Android phones). The CNN App may ask your permission to access certain functions on your device such as location, network connection, camera and social media accounts. Doing so can enhance some features of your app such as weather forecasts, iReport submissions and ability to share stories with your social networks. The CNN App may also ask your permission for “phone calls” to allow you to call CNN regarding story ideas or general feedback. CNN respects your privacy and would never misuse your personal information. Have questions or feedback on the CNN App? E-mail us at Android@cnn.com . We are always looking for suggestions on how to provide the best experience possible for you.
release_text: Maintenance release with multiple performance and infrastructure improvements. How are we doing? We’d love to hear from you: android@cnn.com.

description: Derived from the Google Sky Map. So, contains all of its features. Just point to the sky and know the Indian (Sanskrit) and International name of the star, constellation, planet, star cluster, rashi or nakshatra Contains all major stars, constellations, planets, rashis and nakshatras Includes manual mode - Browse the entire sky without going outside Includes time travel - See the Sky in Past or Future Also contains Messier Objects, major Nebulae, Galaxies, Star Clusters, etc. Includes Search - Let the app guide you to the position of the astronomical body of your choice in sky Other Features - Automatic Location Detection, Night Mode, Meteor Showers, RA/Dec Grid, Zoom, etc. Contains Gallery - Beautiful photos and Sky positions of major Nebulae, Galaxies, Planets, Star Clusters, Hubble Deep Field, etc. Includes Indian (Sanskrit) names of all major stars, constellations and star clusters along with their International names.

Family Bee is an industrial strength family tree viewer. It allows viewing of all details for individuals and families in GEDCOM genealogy files. View all individuals, family information, individual bio information, pedigree trees, descendant lists, notes, etc. Lets you annotate your tree with on-site notes, including photos (graves, primary docs, etc.), and send them to your home machine via GMail. The App is fast, robust, and complete. It has been tested on files up to 20MB (65,000 names). If you need to try before you buy, there is a fully functional (time-limited) trial version available. (Scroll down to "View more applications" to find it on the Market.)

description: FunEasyLearn is the easy and fun new way to learn Danish - whether you like listening music from other countries, travelling abroad, working for an international company, or chatting with foreign friends. Our app encourages your kids to learn speaking Danish quickly. Get the FREE vocabulary app right now! Learn * 6,000 words with images to illustrate words, phonetic transcriptions and pronunciation recordings by native speakers. * Vocabulary covers 15 thematic topics divided into 140 subtopics. * The entire vocabulary has been translated into 59 languages: ✔ English ✔ Afrikaans ✔ Albanian ✔ Amharic ✔ Arabic ✔ Azerbaijani ✔ Belarusian ✔ Bengali ✔ Bosnian ✔ Bulgarian ✔ Catalan ✔ Chinese ✔ Traditional Chinese ✔ Croatian ✔ Czech ✔ Dutch ✔ Estonian ✔ Tagalog ✔ Finnish ✔ French ✔ Georgian ✔ German ✔ Greek ✔ Hebrew ✔ Hindi ✔ Hungarian ✔ Icelandic ✔ Igbo ✔ Indonesian ✔ Irish ✔ Italian ✔ Japanese ✔ Kazakh ✔ Korean ✔ Latvian ✔ Lithuanian ✔ Macedonian ✔ Malay ✔ Mongolian ✔ Nepali ✔ Norwegian ✔ Persian ✔ Polish ✔ Portuguese ✔ Brazilian Portuguese ✔ Romanian ✔ Russian ✔ Serbian ✔ Slovak ✔ Slovenian ✔ Spanish ✔ Swahili ✔ Swedish ✔ Thai ✔ Turkish ✔ Ukrainian ✔ Urdu ✔ Vietnamese etc. Fun * Select from 7 fun games to learn in a uniquely entertaining manner. * Built-in "Spin Categories" feature allows the app to choose a random topic, subtopic and game for you to enhance your learning experience. * "Review Manager" allows you to review all the words you've learned during each game. Easy * No internet connection is required to use the app. * 3 difficulty levels: beginner, intermediate and advanced. * Choose your preferred tuition language from 59 pre-programmed interface languages: Danish, English, German, French, Turkish, Russian, Korean, Arabic, Thai, Japanese, Italian, Spanish, etc. Learn Danish app is absolutely FREE! ------------------- About FunEasyLearn.com: With funeasylearn.com learning apps, you can learn Danish for free. Learn more than 6,000 words through image illustration, recorded pronunciation and native translation into 59 languages: Danish, English, Afrikaans, Albanian, Amharic, Arabic, Azerbaijani, Belarusian, Bengali, Bosnian, Bulgarian, Catalan, Chinese, Traditional Chinese, Croatian, Czech, Dutch, Estonian, Tagalog, Finnish, French, Georgian, German, Greek, Hebrew, Hindi, Hungarian, Icelandic, Igbo, Indonesian, Irish, Italian, Japanese, Kazakh, Korean, Latvian, Lithuanian, Macedonian, Malay, Mongolian, Nepali, Norwegian, Persian, Polish, Portuguese, Brazilian Portuguese, Romanian, Russian, Serbian, Slovak, Slovenian, Spanish, Swahili, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Urdu, Vietnamese etc. The app's vocabulary is divided thematically and covers most aspects of the everyday world, from the restaurant to the hotel, the home to the workplace, outer space to the animal kingdom. FunEasyLearn is a valuable learning tool as it has many fun games developed by experts. FunEasyLearn is perfect for anyone who wants to learn Danish, English, German, French, Spanish, Italian, Russian, etc. Please support us by leaving a good rating, or share this app with your friends on Facebook, Twitter or Google+ if you like it. If you have any issues regarding this app, please feel free to let us know at support@funeasylearn.com ------------------- VISIT US: http://www.funeasylearn.com LIKE US: https://www.facebook.com/FunEasyLearn FOLLOW US: https://twitter.com/funeasylearn CIRCLE US: https://plus.google.com/+Funeasylearn

description: Yoo-hoo! New term of our Magic School has started, and congratulations that you’re so lucky to be the chosen one! Currently, we are training next generation of powerful magicians! In our school, you can dress up in fantastic costumes and learn various Transformation Magic, at the same time, you’re given the responsibility to help the old magician look for the ancient magical formula. Wanna know how smart you’ll be? Let’s figure it out! How to Play: Open the game and choose a character you like to start the game. After you get into the fantastic world, firstly you need to select your own costume, wand and crucible, then you can enter the library to find out a spellbook you’re interested in. And the following step needs you to combine four kinds of materials separately -- magical potion, herbs, collections and stone! By the way, when you refine the stone, please try out the right raw gemstones by yourself because some detail of this ancient spellbook has blurred! If you unlock the items, you’ll find it much easier to make preparations. When everything is ready, you can drag all the materials into the crucible, and finally you’ll see an amazing You! Now it counts on you to master all the ancient power and let it shine!! Features: * 4 adorable kids from different countries to choose * Plenty of costumes, wands and crucibles to choose from * 9 kinds of wonderful Transformation Magic * 4 particular materials need separate combination * Some unknowns in the spellbooks are waiting for you to discover * There will always be something worthy of expecting whether you enchant successfully or not * Continued improvements of this game, please feel free to send us your feedbacks and suggestions Need You Know: This app is totally free to download and play, some basic items are also free to use, but some additional items need you to purchase and pay to unlock. Therefore, if you do not want to use these items, please turn off the in-app purchase in your settings. Thanks.

***This app is no longer needed. Us the eduroam network instead*** This app was made by a student and was not made by UMass Boston. My website: http://josephpcohen.com This will log into the captive portal for you when your wifi connects to the UMB network. This app works by simulating a user logging into the captive portal. It uses the username and password from the settings page to authenticate to the wireless network. When your wifi connects to the network "UMB-Student" the process begins. It will first check to see if you are connected, if it encounters the login page it will log in. If you are already logged in or connected to the wifi the app won't do anything. Shut off your wifi and turn it back on to trigger the app. If you already logged into the network you have to wait till the wifi makes you log in again to see it work. If you have questions then email me: umbautologin@gmail.com http://umbautologin.github.com/ Promo image provided by http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/File:Umb_-_002.jpg
release_text: New version now works again in science building. Added support links in app

description: Music Folder Player was made for people who don't like to see music displayed based on artist, album, track or playlists. If you prefer organizing your audio tracks in folder this may be the right player for you. Besides that it comes with a lot of unique features. • Material Design • Resume where you left. Stores for each folder where you left • Show folders as a 'flat' list if you have a small collection • Alternatively show folder hierarchy like in a file manager for larger collections • Four configurable seek buttons. Very useful for seeking in podcasts or audio books • Equalizer (Android 2.3 and newer): - 4 customizable settings - 8 predefined settings like Bass Booster, Vocal Booster and Party setting • Virtual room and reverb effect (Android 2.3) • Speed control with pitch correction (Android 4.2+) Increase or decrease the playback speed of your podcasts or audio books. Not suitable for music. Please watch the video: http://youtu.be/d_0eWUXs6Yo • Pre-amplifyer: Increase the volume of audio which was recorded with a low level. (Android 4.2+) • 432 Hz playback mode. Please read this article for details: http://goo.gl/Oeg5hh (Android 4.2+) • Car/Sports mode with big buttons • Change volume and balance with two finger gesture. Youtube video: http://goo.gl/9LXsIE • Undo function: Undo actions if you accidentally touch a button or select another track • Shuffle and repeat options (long tap on play/pause button) • Delete and rename files (long tap on file) • Sleep timer • Headset button control (double and triple clicks) • Lyrics via musiXmatch app • Last.fm scrobbling via 'Simple Last.fm Scrobbler' app • Search for files and folder • Share files Note: Since there are recently some complaints in the review section: This app is an audio PLAYER, not a DOWNLOADER. If you search for an app to download new music, this app is NOT suitable for you. This player just handles audio files which are already on your device. Don't worry about 'adware' warnings of some antivirus scanners. Of course the player is not a virus. This is just because the player shows advertisements. The full version is not affected by that. Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/Zorillasoft Permissions: Please take a look at the F.A.Q section on my homepage: http://goo.gl/gH7bme

description: ★ Top Developer Regardless of your playing level, ZingMagic's multi award winning Chess is a fun, stimulating and challenging game for beginners and champions alike. Features include: over 10 levels of play; stunning graphics with choice of boards and piece sets; hints and tips to improve your play. ★★★★★ I love it, very good and its free ★★★★★ Radha super ★★★★★ Really good game Chess is a two player game with a colourful history which can be traced back to its Indian ancestor, Chaturanga. In 1291 the Archbishop of Canterbury in England threatened clergy who continued playing Chess with a diet of bread and water. The game has flourished over the years and is now one of the most popular board games in the world, requiring thought, skill and strategy to become successful. The object of Chess is to capture the opponent's King. To capture the King you must place it in check. If the King cannot escape by itself, or with the help of its army, it is in checkmate and the King is captured. Please note this game is ad-funded. We generate income to pay for the support and development of the game from advertising. The advertising and social media services use anonymous device identifiers and cookies. By downloading and continuing to use this game you consent to this information being collected and shared with our advertising and social media partners. Game features: * Top free Chess game available. * Most downloaded free board game via Opera Store. * Play against the computer or another human player on the same device. * Over 10 levels of play to suit your mood. * Award winning artificial intelligence engine which is particularly strong at expert levels. * Understands all Chess rules such as en passant captures, castling, under promotion, draw by repetition, perpetual check and 50 move rule. * Support for alternate boards and pieces, including super touch friendly boards. * Full undo and redo of moves. * Show last move. * Show legal moves. * Show threatened pieces. * Hints. * Chess is just one of our large collection of best of breed free classic board, card and puzzle games available for a wide range of platforms.

An engagingly written case-based review for the Family Medicine Board Examination and the USMLE Step 3. Master the content with interactive multiple choice questions, customized tests, and statistics to track your progress in this state-of-the-art app. No internet connection needed to view the full app. It is all ready for super quick image and information retrieval. Family Practice Examination and Board Review is the ideal study guide for the primary and recertification exam in family medicine and for licensure exams. This content has been completely updated with new cases, new questions, and new study results--and you'll also find new bits of humor that make this app fun to use and your studying more enjoyable. This trusted review has been applauded by residents and students for its "building-block approach" to teaching that assures you understand one subject before moving on to the next. Family Practice Examination and Board Review contains more than 360 progressive case studies that reflect the realities of clinical practice and prepare you for your exams. The last chapter is a 149-question final exam so you can gauge what you have learned after you have completed all of the preceding chapters in the app. The answer explanations are detailed for most questions that explain not only why an answer is right, but why the other answers are wrong. There is comprehensive coverage of ALL topics on the boards and recertifying exam. It also contains super-effective learning aids such as Quick Quizzes, learning objectives, clinical pearls and more. There are color photographs of conditions most easily diagnosed by appearance. Written not only to help you pass your exams, but to also update your knowledge of family medicine with state-of-the-art information. Also it is an outstanding refresher for primary care physicians, physician assistants, and nurse practitioners. This app is easy to navigate, allowing you to browse the contents or search the text. The search tool shows you choices of words that appear in the text as you type so it is quick and helps with spelling issues. It also remembers past search terms so you can go back to a question or answer very easily. You can also change the text size for easier reading. Bookmark cases, add notes, answer multiple choice questions, view your statistics, and create customized tests on your way to mastering the content! This interactive app is based on the full content of Family Practice Examination and Board Review, Third Edition by McGraw-Hill Specialty Board Review. Authors: Mark Graber, MD Professor of Family and Emergency Medicine University of Iowa College of Medicine Iowa City, Iowa Jason Wilbur, MD Associate Professor of Family Medicine University of Iowa College of Medicine Iowa City, Iowa Disclaimer: This app is intended for the education of healthcare professionals and not as a diagnostic and treatment reference for the general population.   Developed by Usatine Media, LLC Richard P. Usatine, MD, Co-President, Professor of Internal Medicine, Family Medicine and Dermatology, University of Texas Health Science Center at San Antonio Peter Erickson, Co-President, Lead Software Developer

Record, analyze and share your swing with friends and instructors. Compare your swing with PGA pro swing library covering all the key shots from tee to green. Access expert golf practice drills and fitness exercises at home or on the range. HD instructional videos featuring National PGA Teacher of the Year Todd Anderson and top golf fitness expert Randy Myers. GOGI Golf Swing Pro integrates with GOGI’s FREE website (www.mygogi.org) to track all your swings and access instructional videos, stats tracking and other functionally to accelerate your development. No subscriptions or ads. GOGI SWING PRO HIGLIGHTS: 1.) Record, analyze and share your golf swing 2.) Compare your swing with PGA pro swing library (driver, irons, bunkers, short game, advanced shots) 3.) PGA Tour practice drills and golf fitness exercises to accelerate development – add notes and save “favorites” 4.) High-definition instructional videos featuring National PGA Teacher of the Year Todd Anderson and golf’s top golf fitness expert, Randy Myers 5.) Capture and upload videos to your GOGI website profile (www.mygogi.org) for further analysis and sharing with your friends or golf instructor View more at http://www.mygogi.org

A well known tabletop football game, transferred to your screen. Choose your favorite football team and play with friends, play against a computer or cheer on the computer vs computer game. A game gives the possibility of a double play on one device. In the single game you can choose the level of computer AI, you can also enter your own team names. 2D graphics reflects a miniature football field. A game is limited by the amount of goals (even up to 20). After the game you get match statistics, as well as a preview of the results of recent competitions. Simple and intuitive controls. The ability to stop and resume the game.

Sit back and become immersed into the world of God of Light, the game that rethinks the physics puzzle genre with its unique environment exploration gameplay, amazing graphics and exclusive soundtrack created by electronic music icon UNKLE. Join cute game mascot, Shiny, on his way to saving the universe from the impending darkness. Play through a variety of exciting game worlds and dozens of levels with mind-blowing puzzles. Your goal is to explore game levels, seek for game objects that reflect, split, combine, paint, bend and teleport rays of light energy to activate the Sources of Life and bring light back to the universe. Play the entire Celestial Tree chapter for free and unlock dozens of additional levels in Stone, Azure, Frozen and Space Trees for free using collected Fireflies or with in-app purchase. This game more than delivers when it comes to great gameplay experience, so what are you waiting for? Get ready for an amazing trip. Become God of Light! Product Features • Explore 5 different game worlds and 125 levels. • Use mirrors, prisms, splitters, collectors, black holes and filters to control rays of light energy. • Unlock and share your achievements with friends. Do you have what it takes to earn them all? • Collect glowing creatures that help you solve puzzles. • Receive regular updates with new game worlds and levels to explore. Already a Fan? Like us: http://www.facebook.com/godoflightgame Follow us: http://www.twitter.com/godoflightgame Watch us: http://www.youtube.com/playmousgames Visit us: http://www.playmous.com

description: Order a taxi from ORANGE CAB using your phone - 24 hours a day, 365 days a year!! Fast, convenient, and easy to use. Use a map to select your pick-up location, and track the location of your taxi. Receive notification alerts about the status of your booking, and when your taxi arrives. TAXI BOOKING FEATURES: • Request a taxi right now, or select a future date and time for pick-up. • Don’t know your location? - Send the taxi to your current GPS position. • You can also tap a location on a map, or type in a pick-up address. • Save a pick-up address as a favorite, and use it for future bookings. • Select booking options for your taxi (wheelchair accessible, pet-friendly,etc.) • Send additional info the driver - type a message, up to 255 characters. • A confirmation message lets you know your booking request was accepted. • Push notifications alert you when your taxi is on the way, and when it has arrived. TRACKING FEATURES: • Display the current location of your taxi on a map. • Cancel a booking. • Display up to three previous bookings made with your mobile device. • Tap a button to make a phone call to ORANGE CAB (if app is installed on a phone).

Test your strategy against the computer in this rock-paper-scissors game (RPS). Choose rock, paper, or scissors, and the computer will do the same. You may also bet on 2, 3, or 4 game series, in which you must win every throw (ties lose) to win the bet. description: What's that up in the air? A brid? A Plane? Superman? No, it's a row of colored stones falling down. Move it to match the stones of the row with others to let them disappear. This game consists of two phases, the drop-phase (5 rows will drop down and you have to rearange them to match as many as possible colors) and the move-phase (move all blocks to the side or up and down to close the gaps and to reach more stones disappear, try to eliminate as many blocks as possible in 10 moves). If you're bored, try this game, it's easy to learn but hard to master. Feel free to post your points into the comments. If you've got problems with the game, questions or proposals, mail me: sg@izuware.com And now have fun! :)
