description: = Rated 5 stars by our players! Over 23 million players worldwide! The top authentic Texas Hold'em poker! = ○ Updated Royal hold'em & Omaha - play big, win bigger ○ Play free: get as much as 30,000 chips to start out with ○ Join tables without waiting times ○ Experience the most realistic Casino feeling ○ Includes many new poker styles: Bonus, Sit'N'Go, Ruby Tournaments = Features = ○ Authentic Texas Hold'em ○ Over 23 million players - tap twice and you're in ○ Awesome casino experience ○ Loads of gifts, daily bonuses ○ New reconnect function - bet with confidence ○ Additional jackpot games - Blackjack, slot machines ○ Intuitive UI, easy one-button functions ○ Use Interactives (emoticons) to talk to players =Newest Android Version= ○ Choose your favorite dealer to bring you luck ○ Improved Blackjack for greater chances = Rules = ○ Blinds: Two forced bets called small blind and big blind will be placed by two respective players. These mark the minimum bet during the game. ○ Preflop: After blinds have been placed, two cards are dealt to each player and the first round starts. Each player decides whether to continue or fold (i.e. stop playing and give up the chance to win) ○ Flop: After the first round has ended, the dealer places three cards face up on the table. These are called community cards. Then the second round begins and players can raise, call, or fold, depending on their confidence in the combination of their hands together with the community cards. If they raise, all players who want to stay in the game have to increase the ante to the amount set by the raising player. ○ Turn: After the second round, the dealer places a fourth community card on the table. The third round starts and all remaining players decide whether to raise, call, or fold as previously. ○ River: After the third round has ended, the dealer places the fifth and last community card on the table. Players raise, call, or fold, depending on their confidence in their hand. ○ Final round: If the remaining players after the fourth round of betting are two or more, all players show their hands and compare cards. The player with the highest combination of hand with community cards wins and gets the whole pot. If there's a tie, the pot will be evenly split between the two or more winners. ○ For more detailed game rules please visit: http://www.godgame.com.tw/texas9/?op=intro03 = Additional Notes = ○ Users can use their existing Gamesofa, Facebook, or Yahoo accounts to play ○ If you want to use an MSN, Google, or other account to login, please see our “Account Conversion” page for more details: http://www.gamesofa.com/texasapp/?op=guide ============================= Gamesofa- Fun in five easy minutes ============================= Want to play more? Gamesofa website: http://www.gamesofa.com More games: http://www.gamesofa.com/mobile/ Rated 5 stars by our players! Over 23 million players worldwide! The top authentic Texas Hold'em poker! Download for free and play now!

Night Beach Live Wallpaper — free wallpaper for all of you who truly enjoy summer and exotic holiday destinations, with wonderful night beach image, live water effect, animated clouds, animated sailing ships, sandy beach and palm trees. Relax in this tropical paradise at night near the live water, listen to the soothing sound of summer ocean waves crashing on the shore. Features: - Animated night beach landscape background - Animated sailing ships - Live water effect (live ocean waves) - Waves sound effect - Animated clouds - Night beach live background fully supports horizontal orientation and looks great on both mobile phones and tablet devices and supports screen switching - This wallpaper app will sleep when your phone is inactive, so this live wallpaper will not drain your battery - Real smooth 3D animations (based on OpenGL ES 2.0, compatible with 99% mobile phone devices) How to set night wallpaper on the home screen of your phone: Home → Applications → Settings → Display → Wallpapers → Home screen wallpaper → Live wallpapers → Night Beach Live Wallpaper Check out our account for more free beautiful live wallpapers Notice: this free live wallpaper contains ads This live wallpaper has been tested and looks great on latest devices such as Samsung Galaxy S4, Samsung Galaxy Note 3, Nexus 7, Sony Xperia Z

-Informs and educates about macronutrients needed for daily intake -Includes a carb cycle macro calculator, which gives you daily fat, protein, and carbohydrate intake based on your body weight and gender. -Myths and truths section with tips for achieving the perfect six pack -Provides a promo code for $10 dollars off "Tonify" a top of the line fat burning cream This app was created by trainers who have years of experience transforming their bodies and helping others do the same. Please check the transformation/testimonal section on the app to see many of the success stories. Wr provide cutting edge information that combines old school techniques as well as modern day techniques to achieve the best possible physique.

Aplikacja Tech WP.PL to dostęp do treści i artykułów publikowanych przez zespół redakcyjny nowych technologii Wirtualnej Polski. Dzięki zebraniu materiałów w jednym miejscu aplikacja stanowi doskonały substytut serwisu źródłowego dla użytkowników korzystających z urządzeń z Androidem. Tech WP.PL to zbiór ponad 400 najświeższych artykułów podzielonych na cztery kategorie tematyczne: - Komputery - Internet - Gadżety - Mobile Dzięki wprowadzeniu funkcji Pobierz wszystko! artykuły te dostępne są bez połączenia z internetem. Stawiając na wygodę i komfort użytkownika aplikacja została maksymalnie zoptymalizowana pod kątem użyteczności. Dlatego też, aby podzielić się z przyjaciółmi ciekawym artykułem, wrzucić informację na Facebook’a, wysłać link do znajomego SMSem czy emailem - nie musisz korzystać z zewnętrznych aplikacji - zintegrowaliśmy to wszystko w jednym miejscu. Dla gadżetomaniaków aplikacja wyposażona została w przejrzysty i funkcjonalny widżet dostosowujący się swoim wyglądem zależnie od wielkości ekranu urządzenia. Z poziomu widżetu można ustawić wszystkie z czterech prezentowanych w aplikacji kategorii. Strona wsparcia: http://mobilna.wp.pl Używamy cookies i podobnych technologii m.in. w celach: świadczenia usług, reklamy, statystyk. Korzystanie z aplikacji oznacza, że będą one umieszczane w Twoim urządzeniu końcowym. Szczegóły pod adresem http://onas.wp.pl/poufnosc.html Tech Aplikacja WP.PL access to content and articles published by the editorial staff of new technologies Virtual Polish. Bringing together material in one place this application a perfect substitute for the source service for users of devices with Android. WP.PL Tech is a collection of more than 400 fresh articles divided into four thematic categories: - Computers - Internet - Gadgets - Mobile With the introduction of the Download everything! These articles are available without an internet connection. Putting the convenience and comfort of the user application has been optimized for maximum usability. Therefore, in order to share an interesting article with your friends, put information on Facebook, send the link to a friend via SMS or email - no need to use external applications - have integrated all in one place. For gadżetomaniaków aplikacja was equipped with a transparent and functional widget adjusting to their appearance depending on the size of the device screen. From the widget, you can set all of the four categories presented in the application. Support page: http://mobilna.wp.pl We use cookies and similar technologies such as purposes: to provide services, advertising, statistics. Using the applications means that they will be placed on your terminal. Details at http://onas.wp.pl/poufnosc.html
release_text: Poprawka błędu, który uniemożliwiał uruchomienie aplikacji na Androidzie w wersji 2.1 i niższej.

Rediscover the puzzle that may be better to pass the time. About two hundred puzzles have been specially selected for you only the best guessed. It is quite difficult and interesting!
release_text: Добавлены достижения. Добавлены рейтинги. Изменение дизайна.

description: This app brings the latest breaking news straight to your fingertips. You’ll also get weekend news from the Sunday Express, as well as articles from the best of the newspaper’s columnists. The Daily Express app is updated 24/7 and is completely jam-packed with news from around the globe. Download this free app now and stay up-to-date with current events 24/7! You’ll never be out of touch!

A great tool for CAT, MBA and other Competitive Exams aspirants. It simplifies the task of preparing for the vocabulary section. A free vocabulary application with 4800+ frequently occurring English words to improve English vocabulary. Extremely useful for CAT vocabulary. • Three modes to learn the CAT vocabulary - 1) Alphabetical Word: Learn words, their meanings word by word. 2) Test yourself: Detailed score and test walk-through options available. - Ability to save completed test and scorecard for later review. - Summary gives you a birds-eye view of all questions. 3) Practice: Learn while practising -Where one can also learn words and their meanings. 4) Can view words as flash Cards 5) Multi-choice questions quiz 6) Tough words with example • Browse words alphabetically & randomly. You can even mark the words as favorite that you find are important/difficult & revise them. • Easy to use and effective user Interface. • Internet NOT required • Extremely light-weight Settings available to customize the app according to the user. Helps to prepare CAT wordlist & acts as CAT vocabulary or dictionary. Can be used for preparing for MBA wordlist or as MBA vocabulary
release_text: All the features are free now. Now you can see your entire performance. Go to the performance option & then browse through the words that you have marked. :) Also this is customizable . Go to the Settings to get to know more how you can do it!!

description: «Кино.Триколор» — бесплатное приложение, которое позволит сориентироваться в огромном разнообразии киноканалов на экранах вашего телевизора. Благодаря «Кино.Триколор» вы с лёгкостью сможете уточнить, какие фильмы идут прямо сейчас или спланировать теледосуг на ближайшие пару дней. Вы не упустите ни одной интересной вам картины. «Кино.Триколор» — это не только приятные, но и полезные для пользователей опции: - удобная телепрограмма всех телеканалов на сегодня и завтра (общая или для каждого телеканала отдельно); - исчерпывающая информация о каждом кинофильме: создатели, описание сюжета, интересные факты, трейлеры и даже рейтинг популярности; - сведения об актёрах, задействованных в кинокартине: карьера, фильмография — и всё это с сопровождением их фото. «Кино.Триколор» — мы знаем, где идут интересные фильмы! "Kino.Trikolor" - a free application that will allow to orient in a huge variety of movie channels on your TV screen. Thanks to "Kino.Trikolor" you can easily specify which movies are right now or plan teledosug for the next couple of days. You will not miss any interesting pictures you.   "Kino.Trikolor" - is not only pleasant, but also useful for users options: - Comfortable TV show of all channels for today and tomorrow (total or for each channel separately); - Comprehensive information about each film: the creators, the description of the plot, interesting facts, trailers and even popularity rating; - Information about the actors involved in the movie: Career, Filmography - all with the support of their photos.   "Kino.Trikolor" - we know where to go to interesting movies!
release_text: Изменено отображение похожих фильмов на странице фильма.

description: Get an inside look into jobs and companies with Glassdoor, the most comprehensive career community. Job seekers get access to the latest job listings as well as company reviews and salary reports, shared by those who know the company best – the employees. Research open jobs, your earning potential and see what it’s really like to work at thousands of companies worldwide. Features: Jobs • Fast and easy-to-use job search • Share and email your favorite jobs • Save jobs so you'll never miss out on a good opportunity Salaries • Submit your salary for some Career Karma • See salary and compensation by company, job title and location • Research averages and ranges for base salaries, bonuses, stock options and more Company Reviews • Read reviews from employees about the work environment, culture, senior leaders and more • View pros, cons, and advice to senior management • Get opinions from current and former employees about specific companies Interview Questions & Reviews • Read reviews from applicants about the interview experience • See the questions that top companies are asking applicants
release_text: Glassdoor is now available in Switzerland, Austria, and Belgium!

description: I scream, you scream, we all scream for Ice Cream! Grab your ice cream scooper, and choose from a wide variety of cups and cones to start stacking your ice cream cone to the top! Choose from over 60 different varieties of Ice Cream, toppings, candy, cookies, and sweet treats to create your masterpiece! After you're done creating your sweet treat, devour it by tapping the screen, and watch it disappear into thin air! Perfect for kids, and includes a wide variety of toppings, cookies, and more!

INDISPENSABLE! Allows quick access to call or send sms to contacts/numbers you have contacted recently/frequently. · Unlike others, you don't need to configure it manually. It auto select your contacts/numbers depending on the frequency and age of calls and sms. · You can manage a list of numbers that the widget should not show. · See stats and last communications for a phone number. · 4 sizes: - 8 contacts - 4 contacts - 3 contacts - Smart list shortcut This is a WIDGET, so you can't open it as a normal app. To add a widget to your desktop, do a long press on a free space of the home screen and select "add widget". ** WARNING FOR TASK KILLER APPS USERS **: be sure that your task killer is configured to ignore this app, in other case, the widget can be frozen. description: * This application works in partnership with the BabyCam Monitor application available for Android. BabyCam Receiver allows you to receive the full video and audio stream from BabyCam Monitor directly on your Android device so you can always keep your eyes on your baby no matter where you are in your house. Following is a description of BabyCam Monitor ... * Welcome to the future of baby monitoring! This application will turn your Android phone or tablet into a fully functioning, high quality baby monitor. It uses your home WiFi network to stream video and audio of your baby from the camera on your Android device directly to a web browser on your computer or laptop, or to any other Android device that is attached to your home WiFi network! So you can be sat downstairs watching a film while your baby sleeps upstairs, allowing you to just flick your laptop open to see and hear exactly what your baby is doing. Or you can quickly pull your phone out of your pocket while you are cooking dinner in the kitchen to have a quick peek at what mischief your child is causing in their bedroom. You’ll be amazed by the high quality video and audio as well as all the features that let you remotely interact with your baby via the web browser, such as playing lullabies on the Android device’s speaker, or switching the Night Light (the camera flash LED) on or off. With advanced motion detection and monitoring features that chart your baby’s every movement, you have the most efficient possible way to ensure your baby is safe from harm while you are not in the room with them. As you can see, it has all the functionality of the most expensive baby monitors on the market today, but also with added premium features that make this application simply the best way to monitor your baby in this day and age. Why spend a huge wad of cash on an expensive baby monitor with low quality video and audio when for just a tiny fraction of the price you can spend a small handful of change on this application which offers the same and so much more? ------ FEATURES 1. Monitor you baby by streaming real-time live video and audio from your Android device camera to a web browser or to any other Android device; 2. Very simple to use for everybody - no configuration needed ... it just works! 3. Switch on Motion Detection to get pinpoint accuracy of every movement your baby makes as well as a handy real-time graph that shows the intensity of movements over time. 4. Volume controls and a visual representation of the audio, so you have the option of not listening to the sound but still remain aware of the noises your baby is making; 5. Interact with your baby even though you are not in the room – using buttons on the web browser you can switch the Night Light on and off (if your Android device has a camera flash LED) and you can also play lullabies through the Android device speaker, again just by clicking a button in the web browser; 6. Remotely control the camera! Capture precious moments that you’d otherwise miss by taking high resolution pictures and videos using buttons on the web browser; 7. Requires Java installed on the web browser computer; 8. Advanced settings to tweak performance with a choice of streaming resolutions; 10. Only uses a WiFi network – does NOT support 3G. You can stream across the internet by using Port Forwarding – please contact the developer for help doing this; 11. LOTS more features in development! ------ * Before emailing, check FAQs at http://dooblou.blogspot.com * * Follow @dooblou on Twitter for all the latest news and updates as they occur * * Find us on Facebook – Search for ‘BabyCam Monitor’ *

Introducing a new OSM app that easily records house numbers for OpenStreetMap! Keypad-Mapper 3 makes it easy for you to record the GPS coordinates of house numbers for adding them later to OpenStreetMap. This app is the 3rd generation Keypad-Mapper available for the OSM community, and improves on the older generations. ★★★ Features: ★★★ ▶ records house numbers ▶ saves address data ▶ takes GPS photos for entering in JOSM ▶ indicates the GPS reception strength of GPS and GLONASS ▶ exports the recorded information ★★★ Why record house numbers for OSM? ★★★ Free navigation software requires free map data, and although the free OSM data provides a good basis for navigation programs, they are only as good as their data. This is why house numbers are essential to building a reliable map database in OSM. With this app anyone can help compile house numbers for the OSM database by simply installing the app! Not only is it contributing to a great open source project, it’s also fun, entertaining, and easy to do while you’re walking the dog or out for a stroll. The collected data can be added directly to OpenStreetMap. All you need to do is set up an account at www.openstreetmap.org, edit the acquired house numbers, and upload the data to OSM. After only a few minutes, the world’s new acquired house numbers are displayed in OSM. Custom ROMs are not supported. More information: http://wiki.openstreetmap.org/wiki/Keypad-Mapper_3

description: Get your free app & credit card reader today. Simply download the app, activate your account and have your card reader within 24-48 hours. This Credit Card Reader app allows you to accept credit card payments anywhere, anytime. All funds will be in your account the following day and you only pay 0.39% on qualified debit transactions. Mobile Credit Card Reader Advantages A 2014 U.S. Federal Reserve study found 199,800,000 citizens are verified credit card holders. The study also showed some two billion credit cards are currently in use, as most own an average of two to three credit cards. As credit card use is so prevalent, it follows that more and more businesses, large and small alike, are utilizing mobile credit card readers in addition to stationary versions. So why switch to a mobile credit card swiper, or add one to your business? Let’s check out a few of the many advantages that accompany mobile readers: Affordable Celebrated as highly cost-effective, mobile credit card machines don’t cost nearly as much as their stationary counterparts. Additionally, transaction fees are generally less than 3 percent. Ease of Use Mobile credit card readers are easy to operate, as quality options take payments almost immediately after set up. For best results, use a reader that works across multiple platforms, such as Android and the iPhone. Numerous Features and Capabilities Traditional credit card machines have limited functions, but mobile readers offer a variety of features and capabilities. Mobile options offer the ability to run reports and keep track of every transaction and receipt, as each card swiped is automatically saved to your mobile POS account. With everything on record, it’s much easier to track fraudulent charges. Many systems offer customization options as well, such as price structure adjustments. Flexibility Mobile credit card terminals are ideal for those who frequently take their business on the road. This includes restaurants that operate food trucks, makeup artists and other individual proprietors who travel often for work, and those who appear at trade shows and festivals in addition to operating a brick-and-mortar establishment. Rather than limiting business to cash transactions when on the road, owners and operators are able to accept credit and debit cards, which contributes to an increase in customer base. Validity Using a mobile credit card swiper helps small businesses appear more “real” and “valid.” Studies indicate customers feel a company is “established” when credit card readers are used. Additional Transaction Options Mobile credit card readers generally offer more than one transaction option, such as manual entry in addition to using the swipe function. This means never having to write a sign that reads “Credit Card Terminal Down,” which results in lost revenue and unhappy customers. The advantages of using a mobile credit card terminal are many! Add one to your business and see if you don’t notice a positive difference immediately.

description: Note: This is a widget and not an application! It will not appear under the applications tab. A small 1x1 elegant looking widget that simply displays your battery level on it with a number and dynamic icon. At this stage it has a few configurable options such as changing between Celsius and Fahrenheit as well as whether or not to display percentage on the icon. ===Features=== * Simple and elegant design * Shows you your battery level at a glance, as well as detailed information, just by clicking on the battery. *Extra info includes: *Temperature (C or F) *Voltage *Status *Health *Battery Type ==Todo== This widget is nowhere near finished, new features will be added weekly. Here's some we've got in mind: * Notification bar icon (Configurable and Themeable) (Working on this now) * Themes for the widget as well as customization * Estimated time remaining * Graphs displaying usage If you've got something you'd like to be added or if you've got some feedback, just send us and email and we'll do our best to incorporate it into BatteryStats. Similarly, if you've found a bug - don't comment here. Send us and email with what's wrong and we'll try get it fixed as soon as we can. Usually within a day if were not elsewhere!

With this new version of Bataria you can now move your device easily into power save mode with just one tap, and even manage your active apps from the same place. Bataria was designed to be small and efficient, including status bar battery and 1x1 battery widget for quick operation Activating power save mode will turn off all the power hungry resources: Display Brightness, Background Data Sync, Wi-Fi, Bluetooth Key Features: - BATTERY SAVER - ACTIVE APPLICATIONS MANAGER (similar to samsung task manager) - STATUS BAR BATTERY PERCENTAGE (color change according to the battery level) - AUTO POWER SAVING (when the battery level reaches a specified percentage) Power Saving Features: - turn off Display Brightness (set to minimum) - turn off Auto Sync - turn off Wi-Fi - turn off Bluetooth - turn off Haptic Feetback - set lower Screen Timeout - turn off Screen Rotate Battery Widgets: 1x1 Battery Saver Widget 1x1 Circle Battery Widget 2x2 Circle Battery Widget

description: This app helps you find bus times in Ottawa. The app uses the OC Transpo texting system. You simply put in the bus stop code, route number and direction, then send. You will receive a text back in your default texting app (not in this app). OC Transpo Assistant was built by me, a student at Carleton University, to make my life easier and I'm sharing it with anyone who wishes to try it out. I know there are plenty of features that could be added, and perhaps if I have time I will improve it, but for now, this gets the basic job done for me. When you receive a text, any time that has a star "*" beside it means that OC Transpo has updated it from the normal scheduled time by using the current GPS location of the bus.

description: SEE EVEN MORE SCREEN SHOTS AT https://www.facebook.com/smallscreensoftware Manage any account with a balance – checking, savings, debit cards, gift cards, even credit cards – and avoid costly bounced check fees or low balance surprises! Balance your checkbook with Checkbook Genius! And now, do it with a splash of color with the new customizable color background! Recompiled and adjusted for Android Lollipop (Version 5.0), Checkbook Genius has been around since 2009 and has helped thousands of users avoid overdraft fees not just by flagging accounts that are negative, but when they’re getting low. Low balances – you pick what’s “low” – are flagged in yellow, while zero or negative balances are flagged in red. And you can see all your accounts in one handy place! An easy-to-use interface makes it a snap to enter checks (with automatic check numbering), withdrawals, deposits, and more. If you pay bills online, there’s even a place for you to type in confirmation or reference numbers! Handle transactions you create on a monthly basis in one of two simple ways. Presets let you specify a payee and an amount, and you can edit a preset any time if changes are needed. Or create recurring transactions – you schedule for transactions to be automatically posted to the accounts of your choice, and when the post date arrives (or if it has passed), you simply approve each transaction to have it written to the account and your balance adjusted. No surprises! Reconciliation is also easy – Checkbook Genius can bring up a single screen where you can see a total of all your uncleared transactions. Then you tap another button to automatically create an adjusting entry in your checking account. If you need to clear a bunch of transactions as a batch, that’s easy, too – you can mark every transaction in your account with one action, or specify a cutoff date. Checkbook Genius also has a handy backup center, making it easy for you to migrate your Checkbook Genius data from one Android device to another. Here’s a list of some of the features in Checkbook Genius 3 for Android: (NEW!) CUSTOMIZABLE BACKGROUND COLOR. Pick a background color that suits your mood! (NEW!) PAYEE SEARCH. Find all transactions matching a particular payee. RECURRING TRANSACTIONS. Great for managing transactions that occur regularly like rent, mortgage or car payments. CONFIRMATION NUMBER FIELD. Pay a lot of bills online? Jot those confirmation or reference numbers in this new field for transactions! TABLET SUPPORT. If you have an Android tablet, you can enjoy using Checkbook Genius in the easy to view landscape mode designed for larger screens and devices! PRESETS. Presets allow you to pre-define any payee and amount combination for regular use. SCRATCH PAD. A handy place to jot down reminders, built right into the app. SORTING. Sort accounts 6 different ways, and sort transactions 8 different ways. TRANSFERS. Move funds directly between accounts. RECONCILIATION. Checkbook Genius totals up all transactions not marked as cleared. The difference is automatically added or subtracted from your account. AUTO-FILL OF PAYEES. Less typing! After entering the first two characters of a payee name, you’re presented with a list of payees. Just tap the one you want to use. CHANGEABLE LOW BALANCE INDICATOR. You can determine what is “low”. If your account’s balance drops below the figure you set, the account display appears in yellow. PASSWORD PROTECTION. Don’t feel like pattern-locking your Android phone? Create your own custom password or passcode. Stop giving money for bounced checks to your bank and know more about your money with Checkbook Genius!
release_text: New features for Version 3.1.0: - CUSTOMIZABLE COLOR BACKGROUND. Add a splash of color to the information screens by picking your own color! - PAYEE SEARCH. Filter transactions according to any payee name you enter. - NEW ANDROID ACTION BAR INTERFACE. Better support for devices without physical menu or back buttons, matches Android app standards.

description: This license key removes ads from the automated menu planner! - This app is only a license key and it will not appear in your launcher. - You must also download the free Automated Menu Planner. We recommend that you try out the free app first before buying this license :-). The free app is fully functional.

Plan, manage and report on your gifts. Receive reminders for upcoming events for which you do not have purchased gifts. Core Features: MAINTAIN EVENTS Create events for which you would like to purchase a gift by pressing the ADD button or selecting the ADD menu entry of the event list view. You can assign an event category, a presentee and specify a date. This date can be used to trigger a notification to remind you that you have to purchase the gift. Furthermore, you can maintain a bugdet that is assigned to the gifts of this event. You can assign gifts and/or gift ideas to an event. CREATE GIFTS AND GIFT IDEAS Plan and maintain alternative ideas for gifts (Use ADD GIFT or EDIT button of event details view) Maintain the web address of the gift in your preferred web shop. In case you have taken a final decision on a gift idea, mark it as active and it will be taken into account for the budget check and gift manager statistics. In case the active gifts for an event exceed the planned budget, this is indicated by red color, otherwise it will be shown in green. GIFT HISTORY FOR PRESENTEES Display a history of gifts for a presentee in order to avoid duplicate gifts (SHOW GIFT HISTORY menu item of event details view and press presentee of presentee list) REUSE OPEN GIFT IDEAS Reuse open gift ideas of past events for current events (SHOW OPEN GIFT IDEAS menu item of event details view and select gift from open gift idea list) PROPOSE SIMILAR GIFT IDEAS Propose gift ideas that fit certain criteria for the current event (SHOW GIFT IDEA PROPOSALS menu item of event details view and select gift from similar gift idea list). The underlying criteria can be specified in the SETTINGS. SEARCH FOR GIFT PRICES A long press on the gift idea opens the context menu that offers a search for gift prices. In order to enable the search, you have to maintain the corresponding settings on the SETTINGS view. You can specify the price search engine of choice. GIFT MANAGER NOTIFICATIONS Schedule and receive a notification for upcoming events for which not all gifts have been purchased so far (Maintain corresponding settings in settings view) PRESENTEE LIST Display a list of all presentees including basic statistics. Sort them by different criteria. By selecting an presentee the gift history is shown. This allows you to avoid duplicate gifts. STATISTICS Analyze statistics/graphical charts for prices, events and presentees for current year, previous year and overall ARCHIVED FINISHED EVENTS Archive completed events. Archived events are removed from the standard list of events, but taken into account for the statistics. Display archived events using the TOGGLE ARCHIVE menu item. PASSWORD PROTECTION A simple password protection is available. Note, that this is no real security feature. It simply prohibits quick access of unauthorized people. Set a password under 'Settings. Supported event types: Christmas, Birthday, Easter, Anniversary, Thank-You, Wedding Day, Valentine's Day, Others Permissions: - android.permission.RECEIVE_BOOT_COMPLETED: Needed to reschedule notifications after system reboot. - android.permission.WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE: Needed for backup and export of data
release_text: Version 1.7.2: - Bugfixes Version 1.7.1: - Restore database from backup Version 1.7.0: - Propose similar gifts from events of other presentees Version 1.6.1: - Bugfixes Version 1.6.0: - Search for prices of gift ideas added Version 1.5.0: - Backup of database possible - Export of database in CSV format possible Version 1.4.2: - Added new chart type: Pie chart for event types Version 1.4.1: - Added the possibility to specify threshold values for statistics - Bug fixes

description: Wear different watch faces on each day with your Sony SmartWatch 2 NOTE : YOU NEED SONY SMARTWATCH 2 (SW 2) TO USE THIS APP. ALSO THE LATEST SMARTWATCH 2 APP SHOULD BE INSTALLED TO CUSTOMIZE WATCH FACES. The app provides a lots of beautiful watch faces for your SmartWatch 2. Has an easy to use interface to browse, chose and install the watch faces of your choice. All the watch faces works beautifully on your Sony SmartWatch 2 exactly like the stock watch faces. Works even if not connected with host device (Android phone/tablet). All of them are really battery friendly. Works even when the wearable is locked. Clearly legible in sunlight. Makes your SmartWatch 2 look like a real watch. There are colorful watch faces to chose from, in different shapes like rectangle, circular, oval and custom shapes. Has a good blend of analog and digital faces. Analog faces are rich with beautifully moving second hands. Steps to use a watch face From the app install the watch face you liked on your android device. Select the installed watch faces from the watch face editor of Sony SmartWatch 2 app. Wait for it to be loaded on the SmartWatch 2 App includes more free watch faces along with a few premium ones. More and more faces are added on each update of the app. So stay tuned for all app updates. Send your feedback and suggestions to support@espritpixels.com And don't forget to rate us 5 stars ;-) Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2 "Smart Connect extension for SmartWatch 2" clock

Soaring through the chaotic sky during World War II, the paratrooper, under your control, must attempt to reach the battleground down below! 8 unique and powerful weapons are at your disposal including a mini gun, laser gun, rocket launcher, and much more! Collect gems and coins to use at the store to buy power ups and more guns. Upon landing, kamikazes will attempt to kill you as a huge gunship arrives. Experience all of this for only 0.99 cents! ☆Exciting gameplay! ☆Astounding graphics! ☆Epic music and sound effects! ☆Tons of weapons and power ups! ☆Easy to learn, but hard to master! ☆Only 0.99 cents!

description: Small hero is lost in a big maze. Help him find the way out. Collect all coins needed for exit to be opened. Avoid monsters wandering around. Use various powerups to your advantage. Almost 150 levels are waiting for you for free, each packed with adventures making this arcade game for the whole family in a pac man genre. Features: - different upgrades: "speed boost", "god mode", "ghost mode" - different opponents: "lazy worm", "ghost", "cloning worm", "angry worm","dragon worm", "blind worm". Pac them all :) - Almost 150 levels with various difficulty with labyrinths of different types - secret "rooms" to find in most levels - hidden passages to be discovered - intuitive swipe controls that helps easily move around each maze - nice graphics in retro style - all levels (mazes) are accessible for free

description: Sea Empire is real-time strategy game based on mining resources, building ship fleet and conquering islands. Become a trader in wild times of fearless sailors and get domination above the archipelagos. Who can better use resources, faster build buildings and make better strategical decisions ... wins! ***Please - if you encounter any language bug please let us know via email blueplopgames@gmail.com *** Sea Empire is a PEACEFULL strategy game. So if you need warships, gunships, explosions, lot of blood or skeletons DO NOT install this game :-) This is donated, AdFree version of the game. Try the free version first! Sea Empire is suitable for tablet displays. If you wish to stay in touch with us, follow us on Twitter ( @blueplopgames) or Facebook (Blue Plop Games)! Game features: - Campaign - 8 different single game maps - Random map generator for unlimited fun (40 islands max) - Ships to buy - Buildings to build Frequently asked questions: 1) Q: Is there any way to conquer enemy island? A: No, there is not. 2) Q: AI is cheating! A: No, AI does not cheat. But it has got some surplus resources at the begining because it has not as good tactical skills as a human player. 3) Q: I can´t pass level XY. What´s wrong? A: We do not know. But every level is beatable (yes, sometime it is very...very hard). Please read in-game help, turn difficulty to easy and try it again. We would like to express many thanks to: - Yan "BubbleStorm" Diademi for French translation - Rui "Kalimeru" Ladeiro for Portuguese translation

With PhotoVoice you can record your own voice and put it in the pictures available in your gallery or taken by the camera. The result is a beautiful video telling a story narrated by you. It's easy! And also you can: - Add a background music - Choose the duration per photo - Share the final video in your favorite social network (Instagram, Facebook and even on WhatsApp) - Save your video in SD card in Mpeg4 format It is better than the resource that adds voice on pictures of Samsung Galaxy S4 (SIV) or Flipagram..

Roll balls into the grooved play area. Create groups of 4 or more of the same color. Groups are removed from the game, leaving you more space to work with. Create cascades, and double groups to win more points! Sit back and relax, as this is a game of organization, and logic. There is no need for fast paced action, you can play as fast or as slow as you like! Enjoy three difficulty modes, the 150 ball mode, bonus joker balls, cascading bonus points, multi-ball dropping tricks, and game play that is simple to learn, and polished to perfection. FEATURES: - Very simple to learn - 25 Levels to work through - 14 different balls, and a Joker Ball - Auto-save and auto-continue - Popping, Bouncing, Shiny Balls! - That "one more try" feeling!

app_name: Hong Kong News 香港新聞
description: 集成香港主流報紙(明報,香港電台,東方互動,文匯網,大公報), 人性化的設計, 讓您簡單和快速的閱讀各大大馬報章, 即時掌握最新資訊！ 香港新聞列表: -東方互動 -星島日報 -太陽報 -明報 -文匯網 -香港電台 -大公報 -CNN -BBC -RTHK.HK 香港新聞主要功能： -首創直屏(適合大多數手機)橫屏閱讀(適合Tablet,大屏幕手機Samsung Note使用) -智能清空過期新聞（無需手動清除過期新聞） -左右滑動屏幕閱讀上/下一遍文章 -當前瀏覽新聞指針（返回新聞列表後您可以清楚知道所在位置) -已下載新聞內容圖標顯示 -緩存新聞(節省流量，下次瀏覽更快速) -管理新聞資源 -夜間/白天閱讀模式 -調整新聞字體大小 -收藏新聞 -分享新聞 -設置圖片顯示(節省流量) Keywords: 明報 星島日報 太陽報 香港電台 東方互動 文匯網 大公報 香港新聞 財經 香港報章 香港新闻 Hong Kong News CNN BBC RTHK.HK Integrated mainstream newspapers in Hong Kong (Ming Pao, Radio Television Hong Kong, the Oriental interaction, Wenhui network, Ta Kung Pao), user-friendly design, allowing you to easily and quickly read the major newspapers in Malaysia, immediately grasp the latest information! Hong Kong news list: - Oriental Interactive - Sing Tao Daily - The Sun - Ming Pao - Wenhui Network - Radio Television Hong Kong - Ta Kung Pao -CNN -BBC -RTHK.HK Hong Kong News main functions: - First straight screen (for most phones) horizontal screen reading (for Tablet, the use of large-screen mobile phone Samsung Note) - Intelligent Empty expired News (no need to manually remove outdated news) - Sliding around on the screen reading / under article again - Currently browsing News Pointer (Back to News list after you know the location) - Downloaded News Content icon display - Cache news (save traffic, the next faster browsing) - Resource Management News - Night / day reading mode - Adjust font size News - Favorites News - Share news - Set Picture Show (save traffic) Keywords: Ming Pao, Sing Tao Daily Sun Wenhui interactive network Radio Television Hong Kong Ta Kung Pao, Hong Kong Oriental Financial News newspaper Hong Kong News Hong Kong News CNN BBC RTHK.HK

description: *** SPECIALLY FORMULATED FOR LISTENING AT BEDTIME - UNLOCK THE POWER OF YOUR SUBCONSCIOUS MIND - WHILE YOU SLEEP *** MINDSOFT™ SLEEP HYPNOSIS Wish you could reprogram your mind like software engineers reprogram computers - NOW YOU CAN! With our unique MindSoft™ Sleep Hypnosis recordings you can start making deep internal changes to your life - TODAY! Start using YOUR brain's full potential. Reclaim a third of your life for self-improvement and personal enrichment by re-programming YOUR mind while you sleep! Commit to change. Act today. Effectively and easily transform core inner beliefs and create long lasting changes that dramatically improve the quality of your life! MONEY & PROSPERITY The real secret to attracting and accumulating money and wealth permanently - is YOUR mind. If you are constantly struggling with money problems and are seeking a permanent solution for creating wealth and prosperity in your life then please read on. If you have tried all the ideas, plans, schemes and other fads and gimmicks then finally you may have come to realize that the real secret lies within YOU and the thoughts that control YOUR behavior. It is time to try something different. Something that works. Something that works from the inside out and not the other way around. Hypnosis is a powerful modifier of human behavior and has been proven in numerous studies to affect rapid, profound and permanent change. Hypnosis can not only eliminate your hidden subconscious feelings of negativity and poverty surrounding money but can also motivate you to start thinking positively to grow rich and begin unleashing your true innate abilities and potential for manifesting real wealth and prosperity in your life. Tackling at its core the issues and circumstances that hold you back from accumulating wealth. Peeling away the layers until finally you can see clearly the way forward without looking back. Imagine not feeling poor all the time. Imagine money flowing to YOU in abundance. Imagine being proud of your new found wealth and the status that that brings. Imagine a new YOU. Imagine achieving your dreams. Accomplishing your goals and succeeding in your vision. Finally! MINDSOFT™ SLEEP HYPNOSIS Our MindSoft™ Sleep Hypnosis recording are specifically designed to be listened to at bedtime, when the user can listen, as they fall asleep. Together with hypnotic speech patterns that remove negative thoughts, attitudes, habits and behaviours, listening whilst asleep, when our conscious mind is naturally subdued, allows our recordings to gain access and speak directly to the subconscious mind. Creating the perfect conditions for rapid and profound change! HYPNOTHERAPIST TO THE STARS Randy Charach, is a Canadian hypnotherapist with over 20 years experience in the field. Randy has hypnotized the likes of John Travolta, Tony Curtis, Sean Penn and many others from all walks of life. His satisfied clients also include many well-known corporations. He has performed for companies like Microsoft, AT&T, Coca-Cola, Disney, IBM and Xerox, and many, many other satisfied clients. LEARN TO LET GO You deserve to be happy, you deserve to be successful and you deserve to be rich These are things you have probably never said out loud to yourself, something that you may not truly believe. If you can change the way you think, then you can change the way you live. There is no effort on your part, you simply listen, relax and fall asleep. You will notice an amazing change in how you feel immediately and soon the changes in your life will be so dramatic that your family and friends will be amazed. They will want to know your secret and beg you to tell them what you are doing. You can simply say - it is not what I am doing, it is what I am thinking!

It's a normal evening in WIA Field Office; Genoa, where agents with the bad habit of asking questions of their superiors and those naive enough to have opinions, seem to find themselves posted. A normal evening - just agents discussing the absurdity of existence, catching up on Season 2 of Orange is the new Black, playing darts and sampling the new batch of confiscated materials. Suddenly…. the dispatch system is alive with chatter about hovering objects, trails of thick smoke and groovy music. And just before any of the Prime Minister's TV stations have a chance to report what they have decided is happening, the power is cut and the city is plunged into darkness. Which sucks because there's no batteries in the torch, Fabio took them out last week for his remote control car and didn't bring them back. It's Italy, so you can forget about any of your colleagues coming with you before dinner - as the first agent on the scene you will have to rely on those rusty investigative skills to find some clues as to what's been going on and solve this puzzle. Due to recent WIA budget cuts, all firearms have been decommissioned, but hey - at least everyone got a new WIA issued journal. From the makers of Sounds from Outer Space, comes a classic point and click adventure style game that's been described as "More difficult than The Curse of Monkey Island".

Have you ever try the 2048 game and get bored when you know how to get the 2048 tile? I would like to introduce to you this new logic of board game. Magnet Blocks is a very simple game, tap on the cell of the board, if you match up the blocks from up and down, right and left or cross based on your tap point, the two same level blocks will merge into the next level one. Your score will increase as fast as more blocks you will combine. Can you reach at least the block level 11? It’s not an easy task! Try the Magnet Blocks now, it 's a beautiful and additive game, challenge your mind and sharpen your brain. Besides, it 's simple game play but hard to win. Game instructions: Tap on the cell of the board to move the cross based blocks to the tap point, when two blocks with the same level collide, they merge into one. For example: 1 + 1 = 2; 2 + 2 = 3, 3 + 3 = 4 ... The players win when they created at least block level 11 for 4x4 board, level 12 for 5x5 board. Magnet Blocks Features: - Specially developed for mobile devices - Endless challenge from three simple game modes, EASY mode will merge all possible blocks together, NORMAL mode only process one merge for each block in one move, HARD mode prevent merging from around blocks. - Beautiful effects when user tap on the block and two blocks merge into one. - the board will shake when you make more than or equal 2 combos in one move, the strength of the shake will increase based on the number of combos you made in this game. - the score that you got in one move will calculate continuously until it fully sum to the score that you got in one move. - Added possibility to continue game after won game. - AUTO SAVE and continue the game. - A notification will display in beautiful effect when you got more than 2 combos in one move. - Invite Facebook friend to play this awesome game together. - Magnet Blocks have an ability to capture the screen which have your high score and the board of your game, then share that screen to your Facebook wall, your friends will know the maximum blocks you got in the game. - 14 different type of achievements. Some are impossible to unlock. Magnet Blocks is free. We are looking forward to hearing your comment. Frequent game improvements based on your feedback. Magnet Blocks is available for all phones and tablets with Android 3.0+.

description: Hidden Objects Quest 14: Frozen City is our recent installment of the wildly popular Hidden Object Series featuring a fun and frosty journey through the dead of winter. It's loaded with exciting game play and awesome new ways to find objects. It debuts a new and exclusive game mode called FROZEN OBJECTS SEARCH that you won't find anywhere else. The game also features: Hangman Quest, Hidden Time Bomb Search, Conveyor Quests, Thunderstorm Search, and Search in the Fog - to name just a few. To companion the over 250 quests there are to play, visual effects are scattered throughout and help to provide a unique and realistic search environment. An original music score and a 500 hidden object library is married with smart game design where every round of play is different - providing excellent replayability. To top all of that, there is also a KIDS MODE designed for ages 3 years and up where the whole family can enjoy the adventure. • HD Graphics with amazing detail • Over 500 hidden objects to find • Over 250 quests in the adventure • 24 unique and exciting panoramic scenes • 20 unique ways to play • Multiple in-game achievements with bonus search objects • Never-ending game play - every round of play is different • Zoom button for a closer look • Original music score • Includes a separate KIDS MODE for ages 3+

Get the free app as a part of your Writer subscription to manage your writing and research anywhere you go. (Subscribe at http://writer.pearsonhighered.com ) Manage all of your writing projects from your iPhone or iPod—get answers to your questions about research and grammar, instantly cite (search or scan) and organize your sources, keep notes, and view full-text sources while you research. Writer gives reliable answers to all of your questions about research, documentation, grammar and other writing topics. No need to carry around a handbook or weed through search engine results. Just use the Writing Guide search engine to see relevant and clear explanations, videos, podcasts, and examples. Manage your essays and research projects. You can keep track of your due dates, keep notes, and manage all of your sources for each project. Your “Bibliography Score” will flag any potential issues for you. And a “Progress Checklist” will help you stay on schedule from beginning to end. You can even search and view full-text journals and books so you can do your research when you’re on the go. FEATURES: • Writer’s Guide: Search a comprehensive library of content on research, grammar, and writing topics. Get answers to your questions with text, video, audio, and examples. • My Projects: Manage writing and research projects. Track due date and progress. Cite and organize sources. Check your “Bibliography Score.” Add and view notes. • Cite a Source: Cite sources in various documentation styles, including MLA and APA. Cite books, journals, and Web sites using a simple search engine. Or quickly cite a book by holding scanning the bar code with your camera. Keep track of all your citations. • Find a Source: Search, view, and cite full-text sources. 24/7 Support at http://247pearsoned.custhelp.com/app/answers/list/kw/Writer .

A wallpaper and live wallpaper application with a large collection of high quality Lions wallpapers! A slider puzzle game is also included! Enjoy piecing together your favorite pictures in a variety of difficulty modes. Static wallpapers can be set using the wallpaper browser. Live wallpaper can be set by using either:  1) Home Screen > Menu > Wallpapers > Live Wallpapers > Amazing Lions Wallpapers. 2) Launch this application > Select 'Live Wallpaper' A soft fade transition effect is shown when switching between pictures in the live wallpaper, providing an elegant experience. Tapping on the home screen (or waiting for the set interval time) will switch between pictures. Settings can be adjusted from the Live wallpaper settings screen. Allowing you to select which pictures to show and the interval to wait before showing another picture. In App Billing is supported via the 'Remove Ads' button. Upon purchasing this upgrade this app will no longer serve any adverts. This app is completely free and is supported by advertisements. Permissions are required for setting wallpapers and displaying ads. If you have any questions, requests or suggestions, just contact us and we'll happily respond :) Please contact us if you have any issues or concerns with the app before posting a review.

But each stage has limited balls. description: xWriter 4 is one of a kind - powerful editor enables users to write customizable multi-page notes. It is simple, clean, neatly organized, lightweight, yet powerful word processor designed for both tablets and phones. POWERFUL EDITOR Work with smooth scrolling pages with font, keyboard, and many other options! EXPORT AND SHARE SEAMLESSLY The app supports browser for My notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box - copy and paste among storages seamlessly. INTUITIVE INTERFACE Almost every edit options can be changed in the editor – no switching back and forth to settings screen. For fast navigation and operation, on-screen toolbars are provided. GET ORGANIZED Organize documents in your own way. Make different styles of folders and move your notes, or you can make copy of your notes. SECURE YOUR DATA The app offers backup and restore feature. Use password protection to keep your note safe. Some of the xWriter features include: 1) Browse and edit from My Notes, SD card, External SD card, My Document, and Box 2) Folder - create unlimited depth of folders, you can delete/rename folders and move notes to folder 3) Folder style - 9 different folder styles to choose from 4) Search notes - search your notes in specific folder 5) Share document 6) Export as txt or pdf 7) PDF export options - page size(A4, A3, etc), page margins (narrow, wide, etc), print page number, text color, background color, password encryption and more Editor 1) Fast touch interaction through its own gesture engine 2) Toolbar for save, select all, cut, copy, paste, undo/redo, page up/down/begin/end, and page next/prev/first/last 3) Unique background, font, text size, page margin, and line spacing settings for each note 4) 10+ different note styles to choose from 5) Pages - add pages to your note and flip pages by swipe gesture or toolbar buttons 6) Page thumbnail view and manipulation - insert/delete/merge/add pages 7) undo & redo 8) Text search - search for characters up/down with case sensitive search option 9) Fonts – in addition to sans serif, monospace, and serif, it supports arial, courier, times, georgia, and verdana only if installed in your device 10) Keyboard - capitalize all/sentence/word options, and enable suggestions 11) Auto save - choose to save automatically or not 12) Word Count 13) Text selection (double tap or long press to select a word) 14) Insert page, delete page, insert page break, merge pages It’s is compatible with android devices with version 2.2+ including tablets and phones such as Samsung Galaxy Tab, Galaxy Note, Asus Transformer, Acer Picasso, Acer Iconia, Galaxy Nexus, Galaxy S2, S3, S4, Optimus G Pro, etc.

USAA Obstacle Course challenges you to dig deep and show what you’re made of by competing on a genuine military-style obstacle course. Camouflage is not required for this basic training, but if you want to achieve high marks, here’s how you do it. Establish your allegiances in the USAA Obstacle Course by picking a service member from one of the five branches of the U.S. Military that USAA serves. Jump, climb, and tackle whatever obstacles are set in your path to be the fastest recruit to reach the finish line. Avoid getting stuck in the mud at all costs because the loss of momentum will be felt on the stopwatch. As you make your way through the USAA Obstacle Course you have an opportunity to collect as many as 30 flags placed strategically amongst the obstacles. Each flag will knock a quarter of a second off your total time, when it is calculated at the end. The players with the best times are shown on the high-score list, in big bold letters recognizing your accomplishment. So stand at attention, and always remember in order to be the best… you’ve got to beat the best on the USAA Obstacle Course.

Features -Zoom -Move -Cut,Copy,and Paste -Save and Export -Bucket Fill -Undo, Redo and more If you have any issues please provide feedback using the options menu or emailing help.gmg@gmail.com

description: Ladies and gentleman, toddlers and parents, welcome aboard Russpuppy Airlines nonstop flight to fun! Whether or not your kid is a plane fanatic, this educational app is sure to please. There's even a race button for racing planes! And if your child gets scared this app might be the perfect thing to have on an in-flight trip after your flight attendant gives the go ahead for electronic devices :) If your child enjoys this app, make sure to check out the other great apps from Russpuppy! App includes: - Cargo jet - Hot air balloon - Crop duster - Fighter jet - Hang glider - Medical Helicopter - Military helicopter - Paper airplane - Parachuter - Passenger jet - Spitfire - Blimp - Small plane - Space shuttle - UFO - Rocket - Balloon - Wright flier - Race!

description: Meet Wimp - a cute little blob! Wimp sees wonderful dreams... dreams full of adventure. In his dreams life has been quiet and peaceful, but in a sad twist of the story, Wimp's pants have been stolen! This is where the journey begins. Travel across unique and amazing worlds chasing the thief. Every level is packed to the brim with fun, challenges and new game mechanics. The detailed environments, tricky puzzles and Wimp himself will do their best to keep you from getting bored of the game. And we can guarantee that we will continue to strive for the highest level of polish possible - it has been one of our main goals since the first day of our development process. Join this enthralling story and travel through astounding worlds helping Wimp to catch the despicable panty pilferer! As every good puzzle-platformer, Wimp offers you tons of challenging puzzles, different character mechanics including air-control, wall-jumps, double jumps, sticking to surfaces, teleportation and much, much more (not all available at once though, that would be too easy!). We’re constantly working on new levels, episodes, and mechanics so stay tuned! ************************************************ Features : - Realistic physics. - User friendly (and customizable!) controls. - Amazing adventure with challenging puzzles. - Diverse character mechanics. - Different astounding worlds. - Incredible boss fights. - A lot of cute animations. ************************************************ Pocketgamer (9/10) - "Wimp is, by all standards, a great game." ArcadeSushi (9/10) - "Every component of Wimp is awesome, from the “blob walks left to right jumping over bad guys” game, to the “blob solves puzzles” game, to the “blob does the sticky version of Angry Birds” physics game." TouchArcade (4.5/5) - "You might say chasing undies isn't your thing, but Wimp will surprise you." ComputerAndVideoGames - "It is a beautifully-made game. The staffers at developer Flexile have worked on triple-A games as well as mobile, and it shows." IGN - "Leading off our new month of App Store recommendations is Wimp, a happy-go-lucky gelatinous blob boy." ************************************************ Join us on Facebook: http://www.facebook.com/wimpgame Follow us on Twitter: http://twitter.com/WimpGame Check our website: www.flexilestudio.com

*** Recipient of the FileDir.com 2012 Reviewers' Choice award*** This is finally the stock ticker widget you've been looking for. After becoming frustrated by the lack of decent stock widgets on the Android, I decided to make one. The result is a CNBC style, two layer, multi speed scrolling stock ticker that not only looks cool, but provides you with up to date quotes for your entire portfolio in a small amount of space. Recommended use is to put individual stocks on the upper watchlist while major global indices and/or currencies on the lower watchlist. This is a widget and requires one full line of space. To add a widget, long click on empty space within your home screen then select 'Widget' --> 'Stock Ticker Tape Widget'. The widget features a 4 X 1 widget which will work for most phones as well as 6 X 1 and 8 X 1 widgets for larger devices and tablets.
release_text: - Translated to Italian (thanks to a user!) - Additional support for more devices/screen sizes - Minor bug fixes
